Title: Hot Mushroom Dip
Ingredients:
- ["4 slices bacon", "1/2 lb. fresh mushrooms, sliced", "1 onion, chopped", "1 clove garlic, minced", "2 Tbsp. flour", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/8 tsp. lemon pepper", "1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, cut into small cubes", "2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "2 tsp. soy sauce", "1/2 c. sour cream", "crackers"]
Instructions:
["Fry bacon until crisp; drain, saving 2 tablespoons of drippings in pan.", "Crumble bacon and set aside.", "Add mushrooms, onion and garlic to drippings.", "Cook over medium heat until tender and most of the mushroom liquid has evaporated, about 6 to 8 minutes.", "Mix in flour, salt and pepper.", "Add cream cheese, Worcestershire sauce and soy sauce.", "Reduce heat to low and stir until cheese melts.", "Remove from heat and stir in sour cream and bacon.", "Serve with crackers."]

Title: Classic Fettuccine Alfredo
Ingredients:
- ["3/4 lb. uncooked dry fettuccine", "6 Tbsp. unsalted butter", "2/3 c. heavy or whipping cream", "1/2 tsp. salt", "generous dash of ground white pepper", "1 c. freshly grated Parmesan cheese (about 3 oz.)", "2 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley", "fresh Italian parsley sprig (for garnish)"]
Instructions:
["Prepare and cook dry fettuccine in large pot of boiling salted water, 6 to 8 minutes just until al dente (tender yet firm to taste); remove from heat.", "Drain well; return to dry pot.", "Place butter and cream in large, heavy skillet over medium-low heat. Cook and stir until butter melts and mixture bubbles.", "Cook and stir 2 minutes more.", "Stir in salt, pepper and nutmeg.", "Remove from heat.", "Gradually stir in cheese until thoroughly blended and smooth.", "Return briefly to heat to completely blend cheese, if necessary.", "(Do not let sauce bubble or cheese will become lumpy and tough.)"]

Title: Meat Cholent
Ingredients:
- ["2 c. dried lima beans", "3 lb. brisket", "3 onions, diced", "2 tsp. paprika", "1/4 tsp. pepper", "1/4 tsp. ginger", "2 Tbsp. flour", "8 small potatoes, peeled", "1 c. pearled barley", "8 eggs (uncooked)", "2 tsp. salt", "2 Tbsp. fat or margarine"]
Instructions:
["Soak the beans overnight in water.", "Drain.", "Use a heavy saucepan or Dutch oven and brown meat and onions in the fat (or margarine).", "Sprinkle with salt, pepper and ginger.", "Add beans, barley and small potatoes (peeled) and sprinkle with flour and paprika.", "Place uncooked eggs in shells on top.", "Add enough boiling water to cover one-inch above the mixture.", "Cover tightly.", "Cholent may be baked for 24 hours at 250\u00b0 (125\u00b0C) or for quicker cooking, bake at 350\u00b0 (180\u00b0C) for 4 to 5 hours.", "Serves 8 to 10."]

Title: Mushroom Soup
Ingredients:
- ["1 lb. mushrooms, chopped", "1 Tbsp. butter", "1 medium onion, chopped", "3 c. chicken broth", "1 can cream of celery soup", "1 Tbsp. flour", "3/4 c. milk", "2 cloves garlic, minced"]
Instructions:
["Saute mushrooms, onion and garlic in 1 tablespoon butter.", "Add flour and stir.", "Add milk, broth and celery soup and stir.", "Let cook 1/2 hour and it is ready to eat."]

Title: Herbed Mushroom Salad

Cuisine: Indian
Title: Cottage Cheese Meat Loaf
Ingredients:
- ["1 c. small curd cottage cheese", "1 egg, lightly beaten", "1/4 c. ketchup", "2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 Tbsp. prepared mustard", "1/2 c. quick cooking oats", "1 tsp. salt", "1/8 tsp. pepper", "1 lb. lean ground beef", "1/3 c. grated Parmesan cheese"]
Instructions:
["In a bowl, combine the first eight ingredients. Add beef and mix well. Press into an ungreased 8-inch square baking pan. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 20 minutes. Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese. Bake 10 to 15 minutes longer or until meat is no longer pink. Drain. Let stand 10 minutes before cutting. Yield: 4 servings."]

Title: Alan And Nancy'S Stuffed Mushrooms
Ingredients:
- ["2 pkg. mushrooms", "3/4 c. green and red peppers", "1/2 c. onion", "2 rolled pkg. Ritz crackers", "few dashes of black pepper", "1 stick butter"]
Instructions:
["Clean mushrooms; break out stems (set aside).", "Place caps on cookie sheet.", "In large bowl, place stick of butter and melt in microwave for approximately 1 minute.", "Add finely chopped mushroom stems, fresh peppers, onion and black pepper; mix.", "Microwave on High for 5 minutes.", "Remove; add crushed Ritz cracker crumbs.", "Mix well and stuff caps.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 20 to 25 minutes.", "Enjoy."]

Title: Cottage Cheese Muffins
Ingredients:
- ["1 3/4 c. flour", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1/2 c. cornflakes", "1 egg", "1 c. cottage cheese", "2 1/3 Tbsp. sugar", "1 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 c. quick oats", "4 Tbsp. melted fat", "1 c. milk"]
Instructions:
["Sift the first 5 ingredients into bowl and mix in oats and cornflakes.", "Beat egg yolk; add fat, cheese and milk.", "Pour liquid mixture into a \"well\" in the dry ingredients and beat.", "Fold in the beaten egg whites.", "Bake in muffin tins in a slow oven at 300\u00b0, about 1 hour."]

Title: Chicken And Broccoli With Mushroom Sauce
Ingredients:
- ["1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen broccoli", "3 Tbsp. margarine", "3 Tbsp. flour", "1 c. chicken broth", "1 (4 oz.) can mushroom slices with liquid", "1 lb. cooked chicken, sliced, or 2 c. cooked chicken or turkey", "2 Tbsp. chopped parsley", "2 Tbsp. bread crumbs"]
Instructions:
["Mix margarine and flour together in saucepan.", "Cook briefly over medium heat.", "Blend in chicken broth, stirring constantly until thickened and smooth.", "Stir in mushrooms and their liquid. Season to taste.", "Place broccoli pieces in a shallow baking pan. Cover with sliced chicken and pour mushroom sauce over all.", "Top with parsley and bread crumbs.", "Bake at 375\u00b0, uncovered, for 15 to 25 minutes or until bubbly and brown on top."]

Title: Coriander And Mint Chutney
Ingredients:
- ["1 large bunch coriander (Chinese parsley)", "3 to 4 hot chili peppers, to taste (fewer if you do not want it hot)", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 large bunch mint leaves", "8 oz. plain yogurt", "1/2 onion", "1/2 tomato"]
Instructions:
["Clean and wash coriander, mint, chili, tomato and onion.", "Put small amounts of each in blender and blend.", "Add yogurt and salt a little at a time.", "Blend until smooth.", "Store in a container with a tight lid.", "Will last approximately 2 to 3 weeks, just stir each time you use it."]

Title: Classic Lasagne
Ingredients:
- ["1 medium onion, chopped", "2 cloves garlic, crushed", "4 Tbsp. olive oil", "1 (1 lb. 12 oz.) can tomatoes", "2 (6 oz.) cans tomato paste", "salt", "1/2 tsp. basil leaves", "1/2 tsp. oregano leaves", "1/8 tsp. crushed red pepper", "1 lb. ground chuck", "1/2 lb. ground lean pork", "1/4 c. chopped parsley", "2 eggs", "1/2 c. fine dry bread crumbs", "freshly grated Parmesan cheese", "1/8 tsp. pepper", "1 lb. curly edge lasagne", "1 lb. Ricotta cheese or creamed cottage cheese", "1/2 lb. Mozzarella cheese, sliced"]
Instructions:
["Saute onion and garlic in saucepan in 2 tablespoons of oil until lightly browned.", "Add tomatoes, tomato paste, 1/2 cup water, 1/2 teaspoon salt, herbs and red pepper.", "Simmer, covered, for 1 hour.", "Combine beef, pork, parsley, eggs, bread crumbs, 2 tablespoons Parmesan cheese, pepper and 1/2 teaspoon salt.", "Shape into 1/2-inch meatballs.", "Saute in remaining oil until browned; add to sauce.", "Simmer for 15 minutes."]

Title: Happy Hour Mushrooms

- ["10 (about 1/2 lb.) medium-sized mushrooms", "2 Tbsp. butter or margarine, melted", "4 tsp. butter or margarine, softened", "1 clove garlic, finely minced or pressed", "3 Tbsp. shredded Monterey Jack cheese", "2 Tbsp. dry white or red wine", "1 tsp. soy sauce", "1/3 c. fine cracker crumbs"]

Title: Kallaloo
Ingredients:
- ["1 1/2 lb. salt meat, ham bone, pigs tail", "1 1/2 lb. fresh fish", "3 lb. spinach", "2 crabs or 1 corned conch", "12 okra", "1 large onion", "1 clove garlic", "1 sprig thyme, parsley, celery", "1 small piece hot pepper", "2 Tbsp. vinegar", "3 qt. water"]
Instructions:
["Boil salt meat until tender in 3 quarts of water.", "Boil fish; remove bones and add to stock.", "Add crabs or conch.", "Put spinach, okra (from which stems and tips have been removed), onion and garlic through grinder.", "Add to stock and boil rapidly about 30 minutes.", "The addition of vinegar prevents the appearance of slime.", "Do not skim while boiling.", "Serve hot with fungi."]

Title: *Chicken Mandalay
Ingredients:
- ["4 whole chicken breasts", "1/4 c. butter or margarine", "1 (10 1/2 oz.) can consomme", "1/2 tsp. curry powder", "1 Tbsp. instant minced onion", "1 tsp. salt", "pepper to taste", "1 (11 oz.) can mandarin oranges", "1 tsp. lemon juice", "2 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1 c. fresh dates, sliced", "1 c. thinly sliced green pepper"]
Instructions:
["Cut chicken into chunks or slices.", "In a large skillet, melt butter.", "Saute chicken until golden brown; set aside.", "Combine consomme, curry powder, onion, salt and pepper.", "Pour over chicken. Cover and simmer for 45 minutes.", "Drain oranges, reserving syrup. Combine syrup, lemon juice and cornstarch.", "Cook, stirring, until thickened and clear.", "Add dates and green pepper; simmer for 3 to 4 minutes.", "Stir in orange sections.", "Combine orange sauce with chicken mixture.", "Serve over rice.", "Serves 6 to 8."]

Title: Stuffed Mushrooms
Ingredients:
- ["1 lb. country sausage", "2 eggs", "1/2 c. fresh parsley, minced", "1/2 c. grated Parmesan cheese", "1/2 c. scallions, minced", "1/2 stick butter", "25 large mushroom caps", "1/4 c. Parmesan cheese (for sprinkling)"]
Instructions:
["Preheat oven to 400\u00b0.", "In a large skillet, cook sausage over moderate heat until it is broken into small pieces and is no longer pink.", "Drain and mix with parsley and 1/2 cup of Parmesan cheese, scallions and lightly beaten eggs.", "Set aside.", "Melt butter in a large skillet and saute mushroom caps briefly, rolling them around in the pan.", "Cool.", "Divide mixture among mushroom caps, mounding it slightly.", "Sprinkle with Parmesan cheese.", "Bake in a large lightly buttered pan at 400\u00b0 for 10 minutes."]

Cuisine: Indian
Title: Cottage Cheese Dill Bread
Ingredients:
- ["2 pkg. dry yeast", "1/2 c. warm water", "2 tsp. sugar", "2 c. small curd cottage cheese", "2 Tbsp. minced onion", "2 Tbsp. dill weed", "1 tsp. baking powder", "1 tsp. salt", "2 Tbsp. sugar", "2 eggs", "4 1/2 c. flour"]
Instructions:
["Sprinkle yeast on warm water; stir until blended.", "Stir in 2 teaspoons of sugar; set aside.", "Combine cottage cheese, onion, dill weed, baking powder, 2 tablespoons of sugar and eggs.", "Mix well.", "Add yeast mixture and mix well.", "Add flour to make a stiff dough.", "Knead on lightly floured surface until smooth and elastic. Place dough in greased bowl; turn to bring greased side up. Cover; let rise in warm place until doubled (1 to 1 1/2 hours). Punch down.", "Turn onto floured surface; knead a few times.", "Divide in half.", "Shape into bread pans and let rise until doubled.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes.", "Remove from pans to rack.", "Brush tops with butter."]

Title: Clam Mushroom Salad
Ingredients:
- ["1 head iceberg lettuce", "8 oz. country stand fresh mushrooms", "1/3 c. bottled clam juice", "1/3 c. corn oil", "2 Tbsp. vinegar", "1/4 to 1/2 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. tarragon, crumbled", "Tabasco to taste", "1 c. sliced red onion", "1 tomato"]
Instructions:
["Core, rinse and drain lettuce.", "Chill in disposable plastic bag or plastic crisper.", "Clean mushrooms with damp paper towels; trim stems.", "Slice lengthwise.", "Combine clam juice, oil, vinegar, salt, tarragon and Tabasco in large jar or juice container; cover and shake well.", "Add mushrooms and onion.", "Shake to coat.", "Chill.", "Tear enough lettuce to make 5 cups.", "Chill remainder for use another time.", "Cut tomato into wedges.", "Combine with lettuce and mushroom mixture in large salad bowl; toss lightly.", "Add fresh clams to taste.", "Makes 5 to 6 servings."]

Title: Lemon, Lime And Cottage Cheese Salad
Ingredients:

Instructions:

Title: Creamy Shrimp Curry
Ingredients:
- ["6 c. water", "1 Tbsp. salt", "2 lb. unpeeled medium shrimp", "1/2 c. minced onion", "1/3 c. butter or margarine, melted", "1/3 c. all-purpose flour", "1 Tbsp. curry powder", "1 (14 1/2 oz.) can chicken broth", "1 1/2 c. milk", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 1/2 tsp. sugar", "1/4 tsp. ground ginger", "1 tsp. lemon juice", "hot cooked rice"]
Instructions:
["Combine water and 1 tablespoon salt in a Dutch oven; bring to boil. Add shrimp and cook 3 to 5 minutes; drain well and rinse with cold water. Peel and devein shrimp; set aside. Saut onion and butter until crisp-tender. Add flour and curry powder, stirring until smooth. Cook 1 minute, stirring constantly. Gradually add chicken broth and milk; cook over medium heat, stirring constantly until thickened and bubbly. Stir in salt, sugar, ginger and lemon juice. Add shrimp and cook over medium heat until thoroughly heated. Serve over rice."]

- ["6 slices bacon, cut in 1/2 inch pieces", "1 large onion, chopped", "1 (16 oz.) can baked beans", "1 (15 oz.) can red kidney beans (undrained)", "1 (15 oz.) can butter beans, drained", "1/2 c. catsup", "1/4 c. yellow mustard", "1/4 c. Worcestershire sauce", "4 Tbsp. brown sugar", "1 Tbsp. dark molasses"]
Instructions:
["Cook bacon and onion about 10 minutes.", "Combine with rest of ingredients and pour into greased 2 quart casserole.", "Bake, uncovered, at 350\u00b0 for 1 hour.", "Makes 10 to 12 servings."]

Title: Cranberry Chutney
Ingredients:
- ["2 c. fresh cranberries", "1/2 c. water", "1/2 c. seedless golden raisins", "1 c. sugar", "1/4 tsp. ground ginger", "1/4 tsp. ground cinnamon", "1/8 tsp. ground allspice", "1/8 tsp. salt", "1 small can pineapple tidbits, drained"]
Instructions:
["Combine all ingredients except pineapple in a heavy saucepan. Stir well.", "Cook over medium heat 15 or 20 minutes or until the cranberry skins begin to pop.", "Stir in the pineapple; reduce heat to low and cook an additional 30 minutes, stirring often.", "Serve warm or cold."]

Title: Rice With Grilled Pork Medallions
Ingredients:
- ["3/4 c. chopped onion", "1/2 c. chopped celery", "1 tsp. olive oil", "2 (16 oz.) cans ready-to-serve reduced-sodium fat free chicken broth", "1 tsp. dried thyme", "1/2 c. wild rice (uncooked)", "1 c. frozen black-eyed peas", "1/2 c. long grain rice (uncooked)", "3/4 c. chopped tomato", "2 tsp. lemon juice", "2 Tbsp. chopped fresh parsley", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. ground red pepper", "1/4 tsp. freshly ground black pepper", "grilled pork medallions", "1 Red Delicious apple, cut into 12 wedges", "garnish (fresh thyme sprigs)"]
Instructions:
["Cook onion and celery in olive oil in a large saucepan over medium heat, stirring constantly, until tender.", "Add chicken broth and dried thyme; bring mixture to a boil.", "Rinse wild rice in 3 changes of hot water; drain.", "Add wild rice to broth mixture. Cover.", "Reduce heat and cook 30 minutes.", "Add black-eyed peas and next 7 ingredients; cover and cook 20 minutes or until rice is tender.", "Serve with grilled pork medallions and apple wedges. Garnish, if desired.", "Yields 4 servings."]

Cuisine: Indian
Title: Moo Goo Gai Pan(Chinese Chicken And Mushrooms)
Ingredients:
- ["2 whole chicken breasts", "2 Tbsp. soy sauce", "2 tsp. cornstarch", "1/4 tsp. sugar", "1 lb. medium mushrooms", "salad oil", "2 Tbsp. dry sherry or cooking sherry", "1/4 tsp. ground ginger", "1/8 tsp. garlic powder", "4 green onions"]
Instructions:
["Skin and bone chicken breasts.", "Slice across breasts into 1/8-inch slices.", "In a medium bowl mix chicken, soy sauce, sherry, cornstarch, ginger, sugar and garlic powder.", "Set aside.", "Thinly slice mushrooms.", "Cut each green onion crosswise into 3-inch pieces.", "In a 12-inch skillet or wok over medium-high heat in 1/4 cup hot salad oil, cook mushrooms and green onions, stirring quickly and frequently until mushrooms are tender (about 2 minutes).", "With a slotted spoon, remove mushroom mixture to bowl. In same skillet or wok, over high heat, in 3 tablespoons hot salad oil, cook chicken mixture, stirring frequently and quickly, until chicken is tender (about 2 or 3 minutes).", "Return mushroom mixture to skillet and heat through.", "Serve over rice."]

Add the vinegar and cook gently for about 2 hours or until mixture is of required consistency.", "Put into jars and seal.", "Use water bath.", "Makes about 4 1/2 pints."]

Title: Medallions Of Pork With Riesling Sauce
Ingredients:
- ["1 (12 oz.) pork tenderloin, cut into 1-inch thick rounds", "all-purpose flour", "4 Tbsp. (1/2 stick) butter (unsalted)", "1 onion, thinly sliced", "3 garlic cloves, minced", "1/2 c. dry Riesling", "1/2 c. raisins", "3 Tbsp. balsamic vinegar or red wine vinegar", "1 Tbsp. drained green peppercorns", "1 1/2 tsp. minced fresh thyme or 1/2 tsp. dried", "1 1/2 tsp. minced fresh oregano or 1/2 tsp. dried", "1/2 stick chilled unsalted butter, cut into pieces", "1/4 c. pine nuts, toasted"]
Instructions:
["Season pork with salt and pepper.", "Coat in the flour; shake off excess.", "Melt 2 tablespoons butter in heavy skillet over medium-high heat.", "Add onion and garlic and saute until golden brown, about 5 minutes.", "Transfer to bowl.", "Melt remaining 2 tablespoons butter in same skillet over medium-high heat.", "Add pork and saute about 4 minutes per side.", "Transfer pork to plate. Add onion mixture, Riesling, raisins, vinegar, green peppercorns and herbs to same skillet and boil until sauce thickens, about 4 minutes.", "Add pork to skillet to heat through.", "Divide pork among plates.", "Add 1/4 cup butter to sauce in skillet and whisk just until melted.", "Mix in pine nuts.", "Spoon sauce over pork."]

Title: Beef And Mushroom Pie
Ingredients:
- ["2 slices bacon", "3 lb. beef chuck, cut into 1 1/2-inch cubes", "1 large onion, chopped", "1 carrot, chopped", "1 stalk celery, chopped", "2 cloves garlic, crushed", "1 c. beef broth", "1 c. red wine", "1/2 tsp. sweet marjoram", "1 bay leaf", "salt and pepper", "pastry for 2-crust pie", "1/2 lb. mushrooms", "2 Tbsp. butter", "lemon juice"]
Instructions:
["Fry bacon slowly in large, heavy skillet.", "Remove when cooked, crumble and set aside.", "Heat skillet until almost smoking, brown the beef cubes a few at a time on all sides.", "Place beef and crumbled bacon in casserole and keep warm.", "When all the beef has been browned, add the chopped vegetables to the skillet, reduce heat and cook until wilted.", "Stir in 2 tablespoons flour, cook for a minute or two, add the wine, broth and seasonings; bring to boil, stirring to smooth out sauce.", "Pour over beef, cover closely and simmer in a 325\u00b0 oven about two hours or until meat is tender. Make certain it does not boil.", "Remove casserole from oven and cool.", "(This is best made the day before baking the pie to facilitate removal of excess fat.)"]

Add salt and mix again.", "Wash cilantro, dry and mince.", "Add cilantro to potato mixture.", "Refrigerate or serve at room temperature.", "(Substitute cut tomatoes or peeled, grated cucumbers for the potatoes.", "Or use steamed bell pepper, omitting jalapeno pepper.)"]

Title: Indian Fry Bread
Ingredients:
- ["1 1/2 c. dry milk", "2 pkg. yeast", "1/4 c. sugar", "2 Tbsp. meal", "1 stick oleo", "2 c. warm milk", "1 tsp. salt", "5 c. flour"]
Instructions:

Title: Lamb And Potato Korma
Ingredients:
- ["2 lbs. lamb", "2 medium onion, finely grated", "1/4 cup oil", "1-1/2 tsp. ginger/garlic paste", "1 heaping tsp. cayenne pepper", "1/4 tsp. turmeric", "1 tsp. salt", "1 cup yogurt", "2 cups water", "6 cardamom pods", "4 cloves", "1 cinnamon stick", "1 tsp. shah zeera (black cumin)", "1/4 cup cilantro", "6-8 curry leaves", "3-4 green chilies, slitted", "4 medium potatoes, quartered"]
Instructions:
["Wash and remove excess fat from meat, set aside.", "In a pressure cooker or pot add oil and warm over medium-high heat. Add cardamom, cloves, cinnamon, and zeera.", "When it sputters, add the meat, onion, ginger/garlic, cayenne, salt, and turmeric. Brown the meat.", "Cover and cook for 15 minutes in pressure cooker or 1 hour in a regular pot.", "The meat should not be fully done at this point."]

Title: Vidalia Onion Casserole
Ingredients:
- ["8 medium onions, sliced and separated into rings", "1 stick margarine", "1 can cream of mushroom soup", "2 eggs, lightly beaten", "2 c. shredded sharp Cheddar cheese", "1 1/4 c. milk", "1/4 lb. saltine crackers, crushed"]
Instructions:
["Saute onions in stick of butter until just translucent. Put layer of cracker crumbs in bottom of buttered 9 x 11-inch baking dish. Top with 1/2 of the sauteed onions. Dab 1/2 of mushroom soup over onions, then cover with remaining onions and the rest of the soup. Sprinkle light layer of cracker crumbs over onion/soup layers. Beat the milk and eggs together, then pour over the top of the onions. Finish with shredded cheese on top. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 to 35 minutes or until casserole is set and starting to lightly brown."]

Title: Humus(Chickpea Dip)
Ingredients:
- ["2 (15 oz. each) cans chickpeas", "1/3 c. fresh lemon juice", "1/2 c. ground sesame seed oil", "3 cloves garlic, crushed", "1 Tbsp. snipped fresh mint", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 Tbsp. olive oil", "mint leaves (if desired)", "ripe olives"]
Instructions:
["Drain liquid from chickpeas; reserve 1/4 cup liquid.", "Place chickpeas, lemon juice and reserved liquid in blender container; cover.", "Puree, scraping sides of container frequently with spatula, until smooth.", "Transfer chickpea mixture to medium size bowl; stir in sesame seed oil, garlic, snipped mint and salt.", "Pour chickpea mixture into shallow serving bowl; make well in center.", "Pour olive oil into well.", "Garnish with mint leaves, olives and parsley. Sesame seed oil is called tahina in Middle East supermarket."]

Cuisine: Indian
Title: Stuffed Mushrooms 1
Ingredients:
- ["12 large mushrooms, cleaned", "1 large clove garlic, minced", "3 Tbsp. sweet butter or olive oil", "parsley, minced", "pepper to taste", "1/4 c. Mozzarella cheese", "1/3 c. fresh bread crumbs", "1 Tbsp. fresh oregano leaves, minced or 1 tsp. dry leaves"]
Instructions:
["Remove stems and toss mushrooms with 1 large clove garlic (minced).", "Saute mushrooms and garlic in 3 tablespoons sweet butter or olive oil for parsley (minced), pepper to taste, 1/4 cup Mozzarella cheese, 1/3 cup fresh bread crumbs, 1 tablespoon fresh oregano leaves (minced) or 1 teaspoon dry leaves.", "Stuff mushroom caps and place in buttered 8 x 11-inch gratin dish.", "Add 1/2 cup dry white wine to pan and bake for 10 minutes at 350\u00b0.", "Place under broiler for 1 minute or until tops are golden brown.", "Serve hot."]

Title: Lime-Cottage Cheese Salad
Ingredients:
- ["1 pkg. lime jello", "1 c. hot water", "2 1/2 c. miniature marshmallows", "1 c. cottage cheese", "1 small can crushed pineapple", "1 c. nuts, chopped", "1 small carton Cool Whip"]
Instructions:
["Dissolve jello and marshmallows in water; cool.", "Combine cottage cheese, pineapple and nuts; chill.", "Mix Cool Whip and both chilled mixtures together.", "Pour into an oiled 2-quart mold. Chill until firm."]

Title: Vidalia Onion Pie

- ["1/2 stick margarine", "2 Tbsp. margarine", "3/4 c. milk", "3/4 tsp. salt", "1 c. grated sharp cheese", "1 c. Ritz crackers", "2 c. Vidalia onions", "2 eggs", "pinch of pepper", "paprika"]
Instructions:

Title: Mushroom Casserole

Title: Rotini Salad
Ingredients:
- ["2 to 3 stalks broccoli", "10 oz. uncooked rotini", "1 (6 oz.) can small pitted ripe olives", "10 to 12 cherry tomatoes", "1/2 medium red onion, thinly sliced", "1/2 c. Italian dressing", "1 to 2 Tbsp. grated Parmesan cheese"]
Instructions:

Drain; rinse under cold water and drain.", "Combine broccoli, rotini, olives, tomatoes, onion and salad dressing in large bowl. Add cheese.", "Season to taste with salt and pepper.", "Toss gently to coat.", "Cover and refrigerate at least 2 hours."]

Title: Chicken Kiev With Mushrooms
Ingredients:
- ["4 chicken breasts, skinned", "1 lb. cold butter", "1 Tbsp. minced parsley", "2 eggs, beaten", "4 Tbsp. mushrooms, minced", "1 c. bread crumbs", "1 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. pepper", "1 lemon", "1/2 c. oil", "1/4 lb. butter"]
Instructions:
["Bone chicken breasts and cut in half down center.", "Flatten each fillet by pounding gently with cleaver.", "Be very careful not to break the fillet.", "Next, place a 1-inch slice of chilled butter (2 inches long) in the center of each fillet.", "Sprinkle with salt, pepper and the minced mushrooms and minced parsley.", "Roll up and tuck in the ends so that butter is well enclosed.", "Dip the rolled chicken fillets into a beaten egg and roll in bread crumbs.", "Fry in oil and butter for 5 minutes browning it on all sides.", "Garnish with lemon slices."]

Title: Dungeness Crab And Basil Stuffed Mushrooms
Ingredients:
- ["3 c. shredded Monterey Jack cheese (3/4 lb.)", "1/2 c. plain bread crumbs", "2 tsp. chopped basil", "2 Tbsp. dry white wine", "1 clove garlic, crushed", "1 lb. fresh dungeness crab meat", "2 green onions, sliced", "12 drops Tabasco sauce", "2 Tbsp. fresh lemon juice", "1 large egg, lightly beaten", "48 medium size mushrooms"]
Instructions:
["In a medium bowl, combine cheese, bread crumbs, green onions and basil.", "In a separate smaller bowl, combine the Tabasco sauce, wine, lemon juice, garlic and egg and add to the bread crumb mixture. Without breaking up the crab too much, add the crab meat to the bread", "crumb mixture and mix until well blended. Refrigerate for at least 1 hour or overnight."]

Title: Spinach Florentine Stuffed Mushroom Caps
Ingredients:
- ["1 (10 oz.) pkg. fresh chopped spinach", "1/2 tsp. instant chicken bouillon", "18 large mushrooms", "2 Tbsp. butter or margarine", "1/8 tsp. garlic powder", "1/8 tsp. dry mustard", "1/8 tsp. seasoned salt", "Parmesan cheese, grated"]
Instructions:
["Preheat oven to 375\u00b0. Clean mushrooms; separate stems and caps. Chop mushroom stems. Cook spinach with chicken bouillon added to the water. When spinach is cooked, drain well. Saute chopped mushroom stems in butter. Combine spinach and seasonings with chopped mushroom stems. Lightly saute mushroom caps in butter or margarine until slightly browned; drain. Fill caps with spinach mixture and sprinkle with Parmesan cheese. Place in a shallow pan and bake in a 375\u00b0 oven for 15 minutes. Makes 18 appetizers."]

Title: Cottage Cheese Filling For Kolaches
Ingredients:
- ["1 lb. dry cottage cheese", "pinch of salt", "1 tsp. lemon rind", "2 or 3 egg yolks", "1 c. sugar", "3 Tbsp. melted margarine"]
Instructions:
["Combine", "ingredients and mix well.", "When making cottage cheese kolaches, instead of making balls, spread the golf ball size dough", "out", "flat", "to", "about 1/4 inch thickness and place about", "1 heaping teaspoonful of filling in center.", "Then bring the", "dough up to enclose the filling and pinch dough together to form", "a ball.", "Put pinched side of kolache on greased pan. Brush lightly with melted margarine.", "Let rise in a warm place until", "light, about", "15", "or 20 minutes.", "Make a depression in center", "of", "each kolache", "and", "fill", "with about 1 teaspoon of topping", "(Posipka). Let rise again.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 about 15 or 20", "minutes", "or", "until slightly", "browned.", "While", "warm, brush lightly with melted margarine."]

Title: Spinach Mushroom Quiche
Ingredients:
- ["1 pkg. pie crust mix", "1 lb. fresh mushrooms, thinly sliced", "1/4 c. chopped onions", "2 Tbsp. \"lite\" margarine", "2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained", "6 eggs", "1 1/2 c. heavy cream", "1 c. low-fat milk", "2 Tbsp. flour", "1 tsp. salt", "1/8 tsp. cayenne pepper", "1/2 c. melted butter", "1/2 lb. Swiss cheese, shredded"]

Refrigerate until needed.", "Saute mushrooms and onions in 2 tablespoons butter in skillet until tender.", "Remove from heat; stir in spinach.", "Beat next 4 ingredients with seasonings and 1/4 cup melted butter in bowl.", "Spoon spinach mixture into crust.", "Sprinkle with cheese.", "Pour egg mixture over spinach.", "Bake at 425\u00b0 for 15 minutes.", "Reduce temperature to 325\u00b0 and bake for 40 minutes longer or until knife inserted in center comes out clean.", "Garnish with carrot strips, dried parsley and cherry tomatoes.", "Makes 6 servings; 596 calories per serving."]

Instructions:
["Mix all ingredients together in greased casserole dish.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 1 hour."]

Title: Low Cholesterol-Low Fat Chili
Ingredients:
- ["1 lb. turkey burgers or 1 lb. skinned and boned turkey breast", "1 medium diced onion", "1 small diced green pepper", "1 clove garlic (I use garlic powder)", "1 large can crushed tomatoes", "1 large can kidney beans, drained", "1 large (15 oz.) can no-salt-added tomato sauce", "2 tsp. reduced-sodium soy sauce", "1 1/2 tsp. chili powder"]
Instructions:
["Brown meat in pan.", "Add onion, green pepper, garlic, crushed tomatoes, kidney beans, tomato sauce, soy sauce and chili powder. Bring to a boil.", "Reduce heat and cover.", "Simmer about 20 minutes."]

Title: Stuffed Mushroom Caps
Ingredients:
- ["1/4 lb. melted butter", "1/2 tsp. garlic powder", "black pepper to taste", "dash of olive oil", "1/2 c. Marsala wine", "seasoned bread crumbs", "1/2 (6 oz.) can crabmeat", "pinch of basil", "pinch of oregano", "1/2 c. Parmesan cheese", "1 lb. large mushrooms, stems removed (24)"]
Instructions:
["Saute mushroom stems in butter.", "Combine mushroom stems with all the other ingredients, adding breadcrumbs until desired consistency.", "Stuff caps and bake on a cookie sheet for 20 minutes in a 400\u00b0 oven.", "Let sit for 5 minutes before serving."]

Title: Pickled Mushrooms

Instructions:

Title: Medallions Of Pork Tenderloin
Ingredients:
- ["2 lb. pork tenderloin, well trimmed, cut crosswise into 1-inch thick medallions", "1 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. pepper", "1/2 c. flour", "2 eggs", "1/4 c. water", "1 c. dry bread crumbs", "6 Tbsp. butter", "2 Tbsp. olive oil", "1/2 c. dry white wine", "1/2 lb. mushrooms, sliced", "1 Tbsp. lemon juice", "2 Tbsp. finely chopped fresh parsley"]
Instructions:
["Dry meat with towels.", "Combine salt, pepper and flour; dredge medallions.", "Shake off excess.", "Beat eggs with water.", "Dip medallions in eggs and coat with bread crumbs.", "Press meat with heel of palm to adhere bread crumbs; dry for 10 minutes."]

Title: Classic Cucumber Salad
Ingredients:
- ["1 small lime Jell-O", "1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 c. peeled, shredded cucumber", "1/2 c. mayonnaise", "1 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 Tbsp. vinegar"]
Instructions:
["Dissolve Jell-O in 1 cup boiling water.", "Cool some (5 minutes).", "Put cream cheese, cucumbers and onion in blender; blend until bottom of blender is clean.", "Add other ingredients and beat until mixed.", "Add dissolved Jell-O.", "Mix.", "Pour into ring mold or any Jello mold.", "Chill until firm.", "Garnish to suit the meal."]

Title: Crabmeat-Stuffed Mushrooms
Ingredients:
- ["2 lb. white mushrooms", "1 small onion, chopped diced fine", "1 stick margarine or butter", "1/2 tsp. ground five pepper blend", "salt to taste", "1 tsp. minced garlic", "1 1/2 c. Italian bread crumbs", "1 (7 oz.) can crabmeat"]
Instructions:
["Wash mushrooms and remove stems. Dice the stems. Cook mushroom stems, onion, seasonings and garlic in butter or margarine until translucent. Remove from heat. Stir in bread crumbs. Add water or more melted butter if needed to moisten stuffing. Add crabmeat. Fill the mushroom caps with stuffing and place on baking sheet. Bake 15 minutes at 350\u00b0."]

Title: Mushroom Chicken
Ingredients:
- ["6 small chicken breasts", "salt and pepper", "2 c. milk", "3 c. crushed corn flakes", "1 stick butter", "1 can cream of mushroom soup", "1 can milk (soup can for measuring)"]

(Pour milk into soup can to measure.)", "Place back in oven for an additional 15 minutes or until bubbly.", "Serves 3 to 4."]

Ingredients:
- ["1 (8 oz.) pkg. spaghetti", "1 onion, diced", "butter", "1 1/2 lb. ground round", "salt and pepper to taste", "garlic powder, chili powder or Lawry's salt or all 3", "1 can mushroom soup", "1 can tomato soup", "dash of Worcestershire", "grated cheese"]

Cuisine: Indian
Title: Hot Mushroom Turnovers
Ingredients:
- ["1 (8 oz.) cream cheese, softened", "all-purpose flour", "butter or margarine, softened", "1/2 lb. mushrooms, minced", "1 large onion, minced", "1/4 c. sour cream", "1 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. thyme leaves", "1 egg, beaten"]
Instructions:
["In large bowl with mixer at medium speed, beat cream cheese, 1 1/2 cups flour and 1/2 cup butter until smooth.", "Shape into ball; wrap and refrigerate 1 hour.", "Meanwhile, in 10-inch skillet over medium heat, in 3 tablespoons hot butter, cook mushrooms and onion until tender, stirring occasionally.", "Stir in sour cream, salt, thyme and 2 tablespoons flour; set aside.", "On floured surface with floured rolling pin, roll half of dough 1/8 inch thick.", "With floured 2 3/4 inch round cookie cutter, cut out as many circles as possible.", "Repeat.", "Preheat oven to 450\u00b0.", "Onto one half of each dough circle place a teaspoon of mushroom mixture.", "Brush edges of circles with some egg; fold dough over filling.", "With fork, firmly press edges together to seal; prick tops.", "Place turnovers on ungreased cookie sheet; brush with remaining egg.", "Bake 12 to 14 minutes until golden.", "Makes about 3 1/2 dozen."]

Title: Chicken Curry
Ingredients:
- ["1 (3 to 4 lb.) chicken, cut up into bite-size pieces", "1 medium onion, sliced", "2 cloves minced garlic", "1 tsp. ground turmeric", "1 Tbsp. ground cumin", "2 Tbsp. curry powder", "3 Tbsp. oil", "salt and pepper to taste", "1 c. diced potatoes", "eggplant or squash (optional)"]
Instructions:
["Place cut up", "chicken", "in", "large bowl, add 1 tablespoon curry powder, garlic, salt, pepper and turmeric.\tMix well and let sit overnight", "in refrigerator or for 2 hours minimum.\tIn heavy pot, add oil", "making", "sure", "that the sides of the pot is coated.", "When oil", "is", "hot,", "add\tthe", "remaining 2 tablespoons curry powder and the", "ground cumin.\tCook over high heat for 1 minute, stirring constantly.", "Add chicken, stirring to prevent sticking to the pot.", "When\tchicken", "is", "slightly", "brown, add onion and optional vegetables.", "Add", "1", "to", "3\ttablespoons of water if necessary. Cook", "gently", "until", "chicken", "is", "tender. Serve over rice."]

Title: Steamed Mushrooms
Ingredients:
- ["1 lb. medium size mushrooms, washed and cut in half", "1 tsp. seasoned salt", "1/8 tsp. pepper", "1/4 tsp. paprika", "1/2 stick margarine, sliced", "2 Tbsp. water", "1/8 c. chopped parsley (or use as much as you want)", "1/2 tsp. basil"]
Instructions:

Bake 40 minutes."]

Title: Pecan Pralines(Classic Creole New Orleans Recipe)
Ingredients:
- ["2 c. heavy cream", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "2 (6 oz.) cans pecan halves, coarsely chopped (3 c.)", "2 Tbsp. lemon juice"]
Instructions:
["Combine heavy cream and sugar in medium size saucepan.", "Heat over medium heat, stirring occasionally until mixture becomes golden brown and reaches the soft ball stage*.", "Immediately add pecans and lemon juice.", "Continue to cook until mixture again reaches soft ball stage.", "Drop praline mixture from large kitchen spoon onto oiled cookie sheet into mounds, spreading each into a cake 1/4-inch thick and 4 inches in diameter.", "Let harden.", "Gently lift each praline with a spatula.", "Store in airtight container with wax paper in between.", "Pralines are extremely fragile, handle with care."]

Title: Mushroom Mousse
Ingredients:
- ["1/2 lb. fresh mushrooms, chopped", "2 Tbsp. butter", "2 tsp. unflavored gelatin", "1/4 c. chicken broth", "1 Tbsp. dry cocktail sherry", "1/2 tsp. marjoram, crumbled", "1 egg, separated", "2 or 3 drops Tabasco sauce", "1/4 c. mayonnaise", "1 tsp. capers, drained", "1 1/2 Tbsp. green onion, chopped", "1/2 tsp. lemon juice", "1/4 tsp. garlic salt", "white pepper", "1/4 c. heavy cream"]
Instructions:
["In a skillet, saute mushrooms in butter until liquid has evaporated.", "Soften gelatin in chicken broth; add marjoram and heat to dissolve.", "Remove from fire and add sherry.", "Place mushrooms and broth mixture in blender or processor.", "Add egg yolks and remaining ingredients except for the cream and egg white.", "Blend until smooth.", "Add cream and blend again."]

Title: "Marshmallow Pavlova Slice"
Ingredients:
- ["10 large egg whites, at room temperature", "2 1/2 c. fine white sugar", "1 1/4 tsp. vanilla essence", "2 1/2 tsp. white vinegar", "1 qt. heavy whipping cream", "4 Tbsp. white sugar", "1 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1 tin Mandarins, drained", "5 kiwi fruit, peeled and sliced", "1 punnet small strawberries"]
Instructions:
["Lightly grease 15 x 10 x 2-inch ovenproof baking dish and dust with cornstarch (coat well).", "Beat egg whites in large, deep bowl until greatly increased in bulk and soft peaks form.", "Add 2 1/2 cups sugar gradually and beat well after each addition until thoroughly dissolved.", "Add vanilla essence and vinegar and beat for extra minute.", "(Mixture should be glossy with firm peaks.)"]

Title: Polynesian Shrimp Curry

- ["2 c. milk", "1 (3 1/2 oz.) can flaked coconut", "1 lb. unpeeled medium size fresh shrimp", "1 (15 1/4 oz.) can pineapple chunks, drained", "1/2 c. butter or margarine, melted and divided", "1 tsp. curry powder", "1/3 c. chopped green onions", "1/3 c. chopped celery", "1/2 c. all-purpose flour", "1/2 tsp. garlic salt", "1 1/4 c. chicken broth", "hot cooked rice"]
Instructions:

- ["1 c. dark brown sugar", "1 c. water", "1 c. raisins", "1/3 c. oil", "1 tsp. soda", "1 Tbsp. warm water", "1 tsp. cinnamon", "1/4 tsp. cloves", "1/4 tsp. nutmeg", "1/4 tsp. salt", "2 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 c. nuts"]
Instructions:
["Combine the first 3 ingredients.", "Boil 3 minutes in pan large enough to mix everything.", "Cool, then add oil.", "Mix together the soda and 1 tablespoon warm water.", "Add to first mixture.", "Sift together the dry ingredients; add walnuts.", "Mix all with wooden spoon right in pan.", "Bake 30 to 35 minutes in a 9 x 13-inch pan at 350\u00b0.", "Sprinkle with confectioners sugar when cool."]

Cuisine: Indian
Title: Masoods' Kheema Biryani(Saffron Rice With Ground Lamb)
Ingredients:
- ["1/4 tsp. saffron threads", "3 Tbsp. boiling water", "2 c. basmati rice or other long grain rice, washed and drained", "2 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. oil", "1/2 c. finely chopped onions", "1/4 tsp. cumin seed", "1/2 tsp. ground cumin", "1/2 tsp. turmeric", "1 lb. lean ground lamb", "1/2 c. chopped fresh coriander (cilantro)", "1/2 tsp. fennel seed", "1 1/2 c. chicken stock (fresh or canned)"]
Instructions:
["Preheat oven to 350\u00b0.", "In small bowl, drop saffron threads in; add boiling water and soak for 10 minutes.", "Meanwhile, in heavy saucepan, bring 2 cups of water to boil.", "Pour in rice and add salt.", "Cook uncovered for 10 minutes.", "Strain and put rice aside. Separately, heat oil.", "Add onions, cumin seed and salt; stir for 3 or 4 minutes.", "Add turmeric and cumin for 1 minute, then add lamb. When cooked, add fresh coriander.", "Heat remaining 1/4 cup oil and in 4-quart casserole, stir in fennel seed and rice until coated. Spread 1/3 of rice mixture on bottom of casserole.", "Layer 1/2 the saffron mixture and 1/2 lamb mixture.", "Spread the other half of the rice over the lamb and add the meat and then add the remaining rice mixture.", "Put rest of saffron over mixture.", "Add chicken stock and pour in casserole and bring to boil over high heat. Cover casserole with sheet of foil and fold down.", "Set lid on top of foil and bake in the middle of the oven for 25 minutes, or until rice is tender and all the liquid is absorbed in casserole. Fluff the rice with fork and serve the biryani directly from the casserole or serve on platter."]

Cuisine: Indian

Title: Sweet And Sour Lentils
Ingredients:
- ["2 1/2 c. water", "1 c. lentils", "1 small onion", "3 to 4 Tbsp. cider vinegar", "2 Tbsp. honey", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. basil"]
Instructions:
["Combine water and lentils; bring to a boil.", "Cover, reduce heat and simmer 1/2 hour.", "Add chopped onion and cook 15 minutes more.", "Add remaining ingredients.", "Add more water if lentils look dry.", "Continue to simmer for 10 minutes.", "If the lentils are not tender, add a little more water and soak a few more minutes. Serve over rice, bulgur or millet."]

Title: Mushroom Potatoes(Makes 6 Servings)
Ingredients:
- ["1 can cream of mushroom soup (condensed, undiluted)", "1/2 c. skim milk", "1 large onion, chopped", "4 medium potatoes, cooked, peeled and diced", "paprika"]
Instructions:
["In a bowl, combine soup, milk and onions. Stir in the potatoes. Pour into a 1 1/2-quart baking dish that has been coated with nonstick cooking spray. Sprinkle with paprika. Bake, uncovered, at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes or until bubbly."]

Title: Classis Pecan Pie
Ingredients:
- ["3 eggs, slightly beaten", "1 c. Karo light or dark corn syrup", "1 c. sugar", "2 Tbsp. margarine, melted", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 1/2 c. pecan halves", "1 unbaked (9-inch) pastry shell"]
Instructions:
["In large bowl, stir eggs, corn syrup, sugar, margarine and vanilla until well blended.", "Stir in pecans.", "Pour into pastry shell. Bake in 350\u00b0 oven for 50 to 55 minutes or until knife inserted halfway between center and edge comes out clean.", "Cool on wire rack."]

Title: Tandoori Chicken
Ingredients:
- ["1 Tbsp. plain yogurt", "1 tsp. oil", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. ground ginger", "1/4 tsp. garlic powder", "1/4 tsp. black pepper", "1/4 tsp. ground cayenne pepper", "oregano (extra large dash)", "1/4 tsp. turmeric"]
Instructions:
["Skin chicken.", "Rinse chicken with water and dry with paper towels.", "Combine all ingredients (except chicken).", "Mix well.", "Add chicken and mix together until chicken is fully covered.", "Marinate at least 1 hour.", "Bake in a preheated 350\u00b0 oven for 25 to 30 minutes on each side.", "Great on the grill!"]

Title: Chutney Cheese Roll

Instructions:

Ingredients:
- ["fish fillets or whole fish", "1/4 c. cornmeal", "1/4 c. flour", "salt and pepper", "6 Tbsp. butter or margarine", "3/4 lb. mushrooms, sliced", "1 Tbsp. crushed capers", "6 green onions, sliced", "2 cloves garlic, sliced", "1/4 c. bread crumbs", "1/2 tsp. tarragon", "2 Tbsp. chopped chives"]
Instructions:
["Dredge the fish in a mixture of cornmeal, salt and pepper.", "Fry fish in 2 tablespoons butter until browned on each side.", "Transfer to a dish.", "Saute mushrooms and capers in another skillet in 2 tablespoons butter or margarine and remove them to a lightly buttered shallow baking dish.", "Saute the onions and garlic in butter for 1 to 2 minutes.", "Lay the fish on the bed of mushrooms, sprinkle with bread crumbs mixed with tarragon and spread the onions, garlic and chives over this.", "Bake in a preheated 400\u00b0 oven for 10 to 12 minutes."]

Title: Stuffed Baked Potatoes-Chicken(Low-Fat And Cholesterol)
Ingredients:
- ["3 cloves garlic, peeled and minced", "1/2 c. finely chopped onion", "3 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese", "3 large baking potatoes", "1 1/2 tsp. paprika", "3/4 c. low-salt chicken stock", "1 c. plain nonfat yogurt", "1/4 tsp. cayenne pepper", "1/2 c. minced chives", "1/4 tsp. salt"]
Instructions:
["Preheat oven to 400\u00b0.", "Scrub potatoes and prick in several places with a fork.", "Bake in the center of the oven for 1 hour or until tender.", "While potatoes are baking, place the chicken stock, onion and garlic in a small saucepan.", "Bring to a boil over medium heat and simmer, uncovered, for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally. Remove potatoes from oven and cut in half.", "Scrape the pulp into a bowl, reserving the shells.", "Add the chicken mix along with everything, except the Parmesan cheese.", "Beat with a mixer until light and fluffy.", "Stuff the potato mix back into the shells. Sprinkle with Parmesan and place back into the oven for 10 minutes. Makes 6 servings."]

Title: Mock Cream Of Mushroom Soup(Lo-Fat)
Ingredients:
- ["1 (6 oz.) can sliced mushrooms", "1 Tbsp. oil", "3 Tbsp. all-purpose flour", "1 bay leaf", "1/3 c. skim milk", "1 Tbsp. oleo or Butter Buds", "freshly ground pepper", "1/8 tsp. garlic powder"]
Instructions:
["Drain mushrooms into measure and add water to make 1/2 cup juice.", "In a small saucepan, heat oil over medium heat.", "Add flour and bay leaf, stirring constantly, for 1 minute.", "Gradually add mushroom liquid, milk, oleo and pepper, stirring constantly, until it thickens (2 to 3 minutes).", "Remove from heat and discard bay leaf.", "Pour into a blender and blend until smooth.", "Add the mushrooms and garlic powder, blending until pureed.", "Can be used in recipes calling for mushroom soup.", "Makes 1 1/2 cups."]

Ingredients:

Title: Fusilli With Parsley-Mushroom Sauce
Ingredients:
- ["1/2 c. plain low-fat yogurt", "1 Tbsp. olive oil", "1/4 c. grated Parmesan cheese", "1/8 tsp. black pepper", "2 Tbsp. sour cream", "1/4 c. minced parsley", "8 oz. fusilli, rotelle or spaghetti", "6 oz. mushrooms, sliced thin", "1 medium-size yellow onion, chopped", "2 cloves garlic, minced", "1/4 c. dry white wine", "parsley sprigs (optional)", "1/4 c. minced parsley"]
Instructions:
["In a small bowl combine the yogurt, cheese, parsley, sour cream and pepper; cover and refrigerate.", "In a large kettle cook the fusilli according to package directions, omitting the salt. Meanwhile, heat the olive oil in a heavy 7-inch skillet over moderately high heat for 1 minute.", "Add the mushrooms, onion and garlic and cook, stirring occasionally for 5 to 7 minutes or until the onion is soft.", "Add the wine to the mushroom mixture and cook for 1 to 2 minutes or until most of the liquid is absorbed.", "Add the yogurt-cheese mixture and heat through; do not boil or the sauce will curdle."]

Title: Stuffed Mushrooms

- ["12 large mushrooms", "2 to 3 Tbsp. melted butter", "salt and pepper", "3 Tbsp. minced onion", "2 Tbsp. butter", "1 Tbsp. oil", "3 Tbsp. minced scallions", "reserved mushroom stems, minced", "3 Tbsp. bread crumbs", "1/4 c. grated Swiss cheese", "1/4 c. grated Parmesan", "4 Tbsp. parsley", "1/2 tsp. tarragon", "salt and pepper", "2 to 3 Tbsp. cream", "3 Tbsp. grated Swiss cheese"]

Title: Marinated Mushrooms 2
Ingredients:
- ["2 Tbsp. olive oil", "3 Tbsp. minced onion", "1 clove garlic, minced", "1 Tbsp. tomato sauce", "1/4 c. dry white wine", "1/4 c. water", "2 cloves", "1/8 tsp. saffron", "salt", "freshly ground pepper", "1/2 lb. very small mushrooms, washed and stems removed"]
Instructions:
["Heat the oil in a small, deep casserole and saute the onion and garlic until onion is transparent.", "Stir in tomato sauce, wine, water, cloves, saffron, salt and pepper.", "Simmer, covered, for 45 minutes, adding more water, if necessary.", "Add the mushrooms to the cooking liquid and simmer 5 minutes more.", "Turn off heat, cover and let cool.", "Refrigerate overnight.", "Serve cold or at room temperature."]

Cuisine: Indian
Title: Fried Mushrooms Parmesan
Ingredients:
- ["1 c. all-purpose flour", "1/4 c. Parmesan cheese", "1/2 tsp. salt", "dash of garlic powder", "1 c. cold water", "2 Tbsp. shortening, melted", "1 egg, slightly beaten", "2 c. fresh mushrooms, sliced 1/4-inch thick"]
Instructions:
["Heat 2 or 3 inches of shortening in deep frying pan.", "Combine flour, cheese, salt and garlic powder in medium bowl.", "Stir in water, 2 tablespoons melted shortening and egg.", "Beat until smooth.", "Dip mushrooms in batter, drain off excess.", "Fry in heated shortening, about 3 minutes or until golden brown.", "Turn as needed for even browning.", "Remove and drain on paper towels.", "Salt lightly.", "Serve immediately."]

Cuisine: Indian
Title: No Cholesterol Honey Bran Muffins
Ingredients:
- ["Mazola no stick corn oil cooking spray", "1 c. sifted whole wheat or all-purpose flour", "1 c. whole bran cereal", "2 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 c. raisins", "2 egg whites", "1 c. skim milk", "1/2 c. Mazola corn oil", "1/4 c. honey"]
Instructions:
["Spray 12 large muffin cups with cooking spray.", "In large bowl, stir flour, bran cereal, baking powder, salt and raisins.", "In small bowl, stir egg whites, milk, corn oil and honey until well blended. Add to flour mixture, stirring until moistened.", "Let stand 3 minutes.", "Spoon into muffin tins.", "Bake at 400\u00b0 for 15 to 20 minutes or until lightly browned."]

Title: Asparagus, Petits Peas And Mushroom Casserole
Ingredients:
- ["1 (15 oz.) can asparagus or 1 1/2 lb. fresh", "1 (17 oz.) can petits peas (LeSueur)", "1 can small mushrooms or 1/2 c. sliced fresh mushrooms", "1/2 c. sour cream", "1 can mushroom soup", "1 small onion, grated (optional)", "1/8 tsp. white pepper", "3/4 c. sharp Cheddar cheese, grated and packed", "1 c. soft white bread crumbs, tossed in 2 Tbsp. melted butter or 1 c. crushed potato chips"]
Instructions:
["If using fresh asparagus, wash clean, cut spears into approximately 2 1/2-inch lengths.", "Cover with water and cook, just until tender, about 10 minutes.", "Drain.", "Arrange around the outer edges of a buttered casserole dish, stacking on each other.", "Drain peas and fill in the center of casserole.", "Mix grated onion, mushrooms, cream of mushroom soup, grated cheese and pepper.", "Pour over asparagus and peas.", "Toss crumbs or potato chips over top. Bake in 350\u00b0 oven for about 30 minutes or until crumbs are brown. May be made ahead of time and refrigerated until ready to bake."]

Cuisine: Indian
Title: Wild Rice With Mushrooms And Almonds
Ingredients:
- ["1 c. uncooked wild rice", "1/4 c. butter", "3/4 c. chopped onion", "1 can mushroom stems and pieces", "3 c. chicken broth", "1/2 c. slivered almonds"]
Instructions:
["Melt butter in skillet. Add rice, almonds, onions and mushrooms. Cook and stir until almonds are brown, about 20 minutes. Pour rice into a baking dish. Heat broth to a boil. Stir broth into rice mixture. Cover tightly and bake for about 2 hours in a 325\u00b0 oven until all liquid is absorbed and rice is tender and fluffy."]

Title: Greek Rotini Salad
Ingredients:
- ["3 c. (8 oz.) uncooked pasta, cheese tortellini or spirals", "2 Tbsp. lemon juice", "1/2 c. olive oil", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. pepper", "1/4 tsp. oregano", "1 clove garlic, crushed", "2 tomatoes, cut into wedges", "1 cucumber, peeled and sliced", "1 c. diced green pepper", "12 black olives", "3/4 c. Parmesan cheese", "8 radishes, thinly sliced", "1/4 c. sliced green onion"]
Instructions:
["Cook pasta and drain; cool.", "Combine lemon juice, olive oil, spices and garlic in container.", "Mix until well blended and of a thick and creamy consistency.", "Chill.", "Combine cooled pasta with rest of ingredients and large bowl.", "Pour dressing over salad and toss gently to coat evenly.", "Serve immediately."]

Title: Manhattan Meat Roll
Ingredients:
- ["2 c. all-purpose flour", "3 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/4 c. shortening", "2/3 or 3/4 c. milk", "1 lb. hamburger", "onion", "salt", "pepper", "Accent"]
Instructions:
["Sift flour, baking powder", "and 1/2 teaspoon salt into a mixing bowl.", "Cut in", "shortening", "with", "pastry", "blender", "until mixture resembles a fine meal.", "Add", "milk", "all at once and mix to form a soft dough.", "Use a lightly floured board.", "Put dough on the floured board and", "knead lightly about 20 times.", "Place on ungreased cookie sheet.", "Bake", "in", "400\u00b0", "oven", "for 10 to 15 minutes."]

Title: Low Cholesterol Dip
Ingredients:
- ["1 c. low-fat small curd cottage cheese", "2 c. reduced fat, cholesterol free mayonnaise", "1/4 c. finely chopped onion", "1/2 tsp. white pepper", "1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1/4 tsp. hot pepper sauce", "1/2 tsp. celery salt", "1/2 tsp. garlic salt", "fresh vegetables for dipping"]
Instructions:
["In a medium mixing bowl, beat cottage cheese on low speed of electric mixer until smooth.", "Add mayonnaise, onion, white pepper, celery salt, Worcestershire sauce, garlic salt and hot pepper sauce.", "Mix well.", "Refrigerate, covered, at least 8 hours to let flavor blend.", "Serve with fresh vegetables such as carrot, celery sticks, broccoli and cauliflower."]

Instructions:
["Fold together all ingredients.", "Do not add water to gelatin! Chill for 1 to 2 hours before serving.", "Change flavors by using another flavor of gelatin.", "Omit mandarin orange slices.", "You may fold in some of the fruit to match the jello flavor."]

Title: Mushroom Roll-Ups
Ingredients:
- ["12 to 18 oz. fresh mushrooms, chopped", "3/4 c. butter", "4 1/2 Tbsp. flour", "1 1/2 c. light cream or use 6 1/2 oz. evaporated milk and 5 1/2 oz. milk", "1 1/8 tsp. salt", "3/8 tsp. m.s.g. (Accent)", "1 Tbsp. chives", "1 1/2 tsp. lemon juice", "1 1/2 loaves bread", "butter, softened"]
Instructions:
["Cut off crust from each slice of bread.", "Roll slices thin and flat with rolling pin.", "Saute mushrooms in butter for five minutes.", "Stir in flour until well blended.", "Stir in cream or milk; cook, stirring constantly, until thickened.", "Stir in salt, m.s.g., chives and lemon juice.", "Remove from heat.", "Place one to two teaspoons of the mixture on each slice of bread and roll up like a jelly roll.", "Butter the top side of each with the softened butter.", "Freeze.", "When ready to serve, cut in half and place on cookie sheet.", "Bake at 400\u00b0 for about 30 minutes or until light brown."]

Instructions:

Title: Chicken Livers And Mushrooms

- ["1 slice bacon", "2 Tbsp. butter", "1/2 Tbsp. chopped onion", "1 lb. chicken livers", "2 Tbsp. flour", "chopped parsley", "1 c. beef bouillon", "1 tsp. lemon juice", "1/4 c. sliced mushrooms", "2 Tbsp. cooking sherry"]
Instructions:
["Cook together for 5 minutes, bacon (cut in pieces) and butter. Remove bacon bits.", "Add chopped onion; cook 2 minutes and add chicken livers.", "Cook until light brown all over (until they look done).", "Add flour, beef bouillon, lemon juice and sliced mushrooms.", "Add cooking sherry; cook 2 minutes.", "Sprinkle with chopped parsley and serve on toast or rice.", "Serves 4."]

Ingredients:
- ["4 c. (1 lb.) cranberries", "1 c. seedless raisins", "1 2/3 c. sugar", "1 Tbsp. cinnamon", "1 1/2 tsp. ginger", "1/4 tsp. cloves", "1 c. water", "1 medium-sized onion, chopped (1/2 c.)", "1 medium-sized apple, pared and chopped", "1/2 c. celery, thinly sliced"]
Instructions:
["Combine cranberries, raisins, sugar, cinnamon, ginger, cloves and water in a large saucepan.", "Cook 15 minutes, until berries pop and mixture thickens.", "Stir in onion, apple and celery; simmer 15 minutes longer, or until mixture is thick.", "Cool; refrigerate. Makes 4 cups.", "Serve with poultry or pork."]

- ["4 slices bacon, diced", "1/4 cup minced onion", "2 Tbsp. minced green pepper", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1 lb. fresh small mushrooms", "1/2 c. soft bread crumbs", "1 Tbsp. butter or margarine"]

Repeat with remaining mushrooms.", "Makes about 50."]

Title: Asparagus Mushroom Bake
Ingredients:
- ["2 Tbsp. butter or margarine", "3/4 lb. fresh mushrooms, halved (4 c.)", "1 c. chopped onion", "3 Tbsp. butter or margarine", "3 Tbsp. flour", "1 tsp. instant chicken bouillon", "1/2 tsp. nutmeg (optional)", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/8 tsp. pepper", "1 c. milk", "2 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen asparagus, thawed and drained", "1 1/2 tsp. lemon juice", "1/2 c. soft bread crumbs", "1 Tbsp. butter or margarine, softened"]
Instructions:
["Melt 2 tablespoons butter in large skillet; saute mushrooms and onion until tender (15 minutes).", "Remove vegetables.", "Add 3 tablespoons butter to skillet; heat until bubbly.", "Combine flour, bouillon, nutmeg, salt and pepper.", "Stir into butter.", "Gradually stir in milk and cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until it boils; boil and stir 1 minute.", "Cut asparagus spears into thirds.", "Drain any liquid from mushroom mixture.", "Stir asparagus, mushroom mixture and lemon juice into sauce; pour into buttered 1 1/2-quart casserole.", "Combine crumbs and 1 tablespoon butter; sprinkle over vegetables.", "Bake, uncovered, in a 325\u00b0 oven until asparagus is tender, about 45 minutes.", "Let stand 5 minutes before serving.", "Makes 8 to 10 servings."]

Using a rolling pin, spread small piece of dough to make it flat and circular.", "Spread some oil on it, as we do donuts.", "After rolling, spread it again and lay it on a cooking pan (should be heavy). Cook one side until it has brown spots.", "Turn it and apply some oil.", "When the other side is brown, do the same.", "Turn again and cook both sides until golden brown.", "Store in a tight place.", "Keep them warm and soft.", "Serve warm with chicken or beef (or any) soup."]

Cuisine: Honduran
Title: Ham And Cheese Scones
Ingredients:
- ["2 c. all-purpose flour", "1 Tbsp. baking powder", "2 tsp. sugar", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. ground red pepper", "3 Tbsp. chilled butter, cut into small pieces", "3/4 c. (3 oz.) shredded reduced-fat extra-sharp Cheddar cheese", "3/4 c. finely chopped 33% less-sodium ham (3 oz.)", "3/4 c. fat-free buttermilk", "2 large egg whites", "cooking spray"]
Instructions:
["Preheat oven to 400\u00b0. Lightly spoon flour into dry measuring cup; level with a knife. Combine flour, baking powder, sugar, salt and pepper in a large bowl. Cut in butter with a pastry blender or 2 knives until mixture resembles coarse meal. Stir in cheese and ham. Combine buttermilk and egg whites, stirring with a whisk. Add to flour mixture, stirring just until moist. Turn dough out onto a lightly floured surface; knead lightly 4 to 5 times with floured hands. Pat dough into an 8-inch circle on a baking sheet coated with cooking spray. Cut dough into 8 wedges, cutting into but not through dough. Bake at 400\u00b0 for 20 minutes or until lightly browned. Makes 8 servings."]

Title: Congealed Dessert
Ingredients:
- ["1 (3 oz.) pkg. lime jello", "3/4 c. boiling water", "1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese", "1/2 c. mayonnaise", "1 small can crushed pineapple", "2 medium bananas", "1/2 c. chopped pecans", "1/2 c. maraschino red cherries", "1/2 pt. whipping cream"]

Title: New Orleans Red Beans And Rice(Servings: 6.  Preparation Time: 4 Hours.)
Ingredients:
- ["1 lb. red kidney beans (dried)", "1/2 lb. salt pork", "1 whole onion, chopped", "2 cloves garlic, chopped", "1/4 c. celery, chopped", "1 qt. ham or beef stock", "1/2 tsp. Tabasco sauce", "1 tsp. salt", "1 whole bay leaf", "1/4 tsp. thyme", "3 c. rice"]
Instructions:
["Soak beans in water overnight.", "Drain.", "In a Dutch oven, brown salt pork.", "Add onions, garlic and celery and saute for 3 minutes. Add beans, stock, Tabasco sauce, salt and herbs.", "Simmer 3 hours or until beans are tender.", "Add water when necessary during cooking; water should barely cover beans at end of cooking. Remove 1 cup beans and mash to paste.", "Add mashed bean paste back to beans; stir until liquid is thickened.", "Serve over hot rice."]

Title: Coconut Cake
Ingredients:
- ["1/2 c. butter", "1/2 c. shortening", "4 eggs", "2 c. sugar", "2 2/3 c. flour", "1 c. whole milk", "2 tsp. baking powder", "1 1/2 tsp. flavor (vanilla, pineapple or coconut)"]
Instructions:
["Mix butter, shortening and eggs, adding dry ingredients and milk.", "Bake in well-greased and floured pan for 20 to 25 minutes or until done to touch in 350\u00b0 oven in three 9-inch pans."]

Cuisine: Honduran
Title: Raspberry Coconut Layer Bars
Ingredients:
- ["1 2/3 c. graham cracker crumbs", "1/2 c. butter, melted", "2 2/3 c. coconut (7 oz. pkg.)", "1 1/4 c. sweetened condensed milk (14 oz. can)", "1 c. red raspberry jam or preserves", "1/3 c. finely chopped walnuts", "1/2 c. semi-sweet chocolate morsels, melted", "1/4 c. chopped white baking bar, melted"]
Instructions:
["In medium bowl, combine cracker crumbs and butter.", "Spread evenly over bottom of 13 x 9-inch pan, pressing to make crust. Sprinkle coconut over crust.", "Pour condensed milk evenly over coconut.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 20 to 25 minutes or until lightly brown; cool.", "Spread jam over coconut layer.", "Chill 3 to 4 hours. Sprinkle with walnuts.", "Drizzle dark chocolate, then white chocolate over top layer to make lacy effect.", "Chill.", "Makes 24 bars."]

Cuisine: Honduran

Title: Moist 'N Creamy Coconut Cake
Ingredients:
- ["1 (2 layer size) pkg. yellow cake mix or pudding-included cake mix", "1 1/2 c. milk", "1/2 c. sugar", "2 c. Baker's Angel Flake coconut", "3 1/2 c. or 1 (8 oz.) container Cool Whip whipped topping, thawed"]
Instructions:
["Prepare cake mix as directed on package, baking in 13 x 9-inch pan.", "Cool 15 minutes, then poke holes down through cake with utility fork.", "Meanwhile, combine milk, sugar and 1/2 cup coconut in saucepan.", "Bring to a boil; reduce heat and simmer 1 minute. Carefully spoon over warm cake, allowing liquid to soak down through holes.", "Cool completely.", "Fold 1/2 cup of the coconut into whipped topping and spread over cake.", "Sprinkle with remaining coconut.", "Chill overnight.", "Store leftover cake in refrigerator."]

Title: Ring Of Coconut Fudge Cake
Ingredients:
- ["2 c. sugar", "1 c. cooking oil", "2 eggs", "3 c. enriched all-purpose flour *", "3/4 c. unsweetened cocoa", "2 tsp. soda", "2 tsp. baking powder", "1 1/2 tsp. salt", "1 c. hot coffee or water", "1 c. buttermilk or sour milk", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. chopped nuts", "1 c. powdered sugar", "3 Tbsp. cocoa", "2 Tbsp. butter", "2 tsp. vanilla", "1 to 3 Tbsp. hot water"]

Title: Walnut Scone Drops With Mock Devonshire Cream
Ingredients:
- ["2 c. flour", "2 tsp. baking powder", "1/4 tsp. baking soda", "2/3 to 3/4 c. buttermilk", "1/4 c. sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/3 c. butter or margarine", "1/2 c. chopped walnuts"]
Instructions:
["Heat oven to 375\u00b0.", "Grease cookie sheets.", "Lightly spoon flour into measuring cup; level off.", "In a large bowl, combine flour, sugar, baking powder, salt and baking soda; blend well.", "Using fork or pastry blender, cut in butter until mixture resembles coarse crumbs.", "Add buttermilk and walnuts; lightly stir just until dry ingredients are moistened.", "Drop by heaping teaspoonfuls 2 inches apart on prepared cookie sheets.", "Bake at 375\u00b0 for 9 to 12 minutes or until light golden brown.", "Immediately remove from cookie sheets.", "Serve warm.", "Makes 30."]

Title: Coconut Cream Pie
Ingredients:
- ["1 c. white sugar", "1 c. coconut", "4 heaping Tbsp. flour or cornstarch", "4 egg yolks, beaten", "2 c. milk", "1/2 stick margarine", "5 tsp. sugar", "4 egg whites", "2 tsp. vanilla"]

Title: Coconut Caramels
Ingredients:
- ["1 c. sugar", "3/4 c. light corn syrup", "1 1/2 c. half and half, divided", "1 (3 1/2 oz.) can coconut", "2 Tbsp. butter or margarine", "1 Tbsp. vanilla extract"]
Instructions:
["Combine sugar, corn syrup and 1/2 cup half and half in a heavy saucepan.", "Cook over low heat, stirring constantly, until mixture reaches soft ball stage (230\u00b0 on candy thermometer).", "Add 1/2 cup half and half; cook, stirring constantly, until mixture reaches soft ball stage again.", "Add remaining half and half; cook, stirring constantly, until mixture again reaches the soft ball stage.", "Remove mixture from heat; add coconut, butter and vanilla. Stir until butter is melted.", "Pour into a greased 8 x 4 x 2 5/8-inch loaf pan; let stand until cool.", "Turn candy out onto a marble slab or waxed paper.", "Cut into 1-inch squares.", "Let stand overnight.", "Wrap individually in plastic wrap.", "Yield:", "About 32 (1-inch) pieces."]

Title: Coconut Cream Pie
Ingredients:
- ["3/4 C. sugar", "1/4 C. cornstarch", "1/8 tsp. salt", "3 C. milk", "3 egg yolks, beaten", "3/4 C. coconut, divided", "1 1/2 Tbsp. butter or margarine", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 basic pie shell"]
Instructions:
["Combine first 3 ingredients in a heavy saucepan. Combine milk and egg yolks gradually stir into sugar mixture. Cook over medium heat stirring constantly until mixture thickens and boils. Boil 1 minute stirring constantly. Remove from heat, stir in 1/2 cup coconut, butter and vanilla. Pour into pie shell. Cover with meringue sealing edges and sprinkle 1/4 cup coconut on top of meringue and bake in 350 degree oven for 12 to 15 minutes."]

Cuisine: Honduran
Title: Amazing Coconut Pie
Ingredients:
- ["2 c. fresh whole milk", "3/4 c. sugar", "1/2 c. Bisquick", "4 eggs", "1/4 c. butter or margarine", "1 1/2 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. Baker's Angel Flake coconut"]
Instructions:
["Combine all ingredients except coconut in electric blender (can be mixed with electric mixer if you do not have blender) container. Cover and blend on low speed for 3 minutes.", "Pour into a greased 9-inch pie pan.", "Let stand about 5 minutes, then sprinkle coconut. Bake at 350\u00b0 for 40 minutes or until a table knife comes out clean when inserted into middle of pie.", "Serve warm or cool with whipped cream or not.", "This pie makes its own crust.", "A great pie when you have unexpected guests."]

Cuisine: Honduran

Title: Bean And Bacon Soup

Instructions:
["In a 1-quart casserole, combine onion, celery, bell pepper, garlic and oil.", "Cover; vent top and microwave on High 3 minutes until softened.", "Stir halfway through cooking.", "Add remaining ingredients and stir.", "Cover and microwave on High 1 minute until thoroughly heated.", "Serves two 1-cup servings.", "Contains 164 calories, 6 gm fat and 496 mg sodium."]

Title: Mostaccioli With Bacon And Mushrooms
Ingredients:
- ["6 to 8 slices bacon, cut up", "2 (4.5 oz.) jars whole mushrooms, drained", "1/2 (1 lb.) pkg. mostaccioli, uncooked", "3/4 c. half and half", "1/3 c. butter or margarine", "2 tsp. parsley flakes", "1/2 tsp. salt (if desired)", "1 small garlic clove, minced", "6 to 8 drops hot pepper sauce", "1/3 c. grated Parmesan cheese", "1/4 c. sliced green onions"]
Instructions:
["In a medium skillet, cook bacon until crisp. Remove from fat and set aside.", "Add mushrooms to bacon fat. Cook until golden; drain and set aside.", "Prepare mostaccioli according to package directions. Drain.", "In same saucepan, combine half and half, butter, parsley flakes, salt, garlic and hot pepper sauce.", "Heat just until butter melts, stirring frequently. Combine bacon, mushrooms, hot mostaccioli, half and half mixture and Parmesan cheese. Toss to coat.", "Place on warm serving platter. Garnish with green onions.", "Serve immediately.", "Refrigerate leftovers.", "Makes 4 servings."]

Title: Coney Island Sauce

Instructions:

Title: Cherry Confetti Cake
Ingredients:
- ["3 c. flour", "2 tsp. baking powder", "1 tsp. salt", "1 c. shortening (1/2 butter can be used)", "4 c. confectioners sugar", "1 tsp. almond extract", "4 eggs, added one at a time", "1 c. milk", "1/2 c. walnuts, chopped", "1 c. maraschino cherries, drained and finely cut"]
Instructions:

Bake at 350\u00b0 for 60 to 65 minutes.", "Remove from oven and while still warm spread on top with butter and sprinkle with a mixture of cinnamon and sugar."]

Title: Bacon Tossed Brussel Sprouts
Ingredients:
- ["1 Tbsp. and 1/2 tsp. salt", "3 pt. Brussel sprouts, cleaned and halved", "8 strips thick sliced bacon, cut crosswise into thin strips", "1/3 c. onion, chopped", "1/2 tsp. pepper", "3-4 Tbsp. white wine vinegar", "1 Tbsp. butter"]
Instructions:
["Fill 6 quart Dutch oven with water. Add 1 Tbsp. salt. Bring water to a boil; add Brussels sprouts. Reduce heat to medium. Cook 12 minutes, until crisp and tender. Drain and rinse under cold water to stop cooking. In large non-stick pan, over medium heat, cook bacon for 5 minutes until slightly crisp. Pour off fat. Add onion to bacon in skillet and cook for 5 minutes or until tender. Add sprouts, remaining salt and pepper. Heat thoroughly. Add vinegar and butter, stirring to melt butter."]

Title: Chicken In Green Sauce-Guatemala(Jocon)
Ingredients:
- ["6 boneless, skinless chicken breasts", "4 cups of water", "1 tsp. salt", "2 tortillas, sliced", "1 Tbsp. squash seeds", "1 cup cilantro, fresh", "1/2 cup sesame seeds", "1 cup green onions chopped, green part only", "1/2 cup sliced tomatillos", "1 1/2 tsp. hot green chiles", "1 Tbsp. corn oil", "Rice, optional"]
Instructions:
["Cook chicken in the water with 1 tsp. of salt in a covered pot, about 30 minutes, or until chicken is soft.", "Remove chicken and set aside.", "Save broth and soak tortillas in in it.", "Toast sesame seeds and squash seeds in a skillet until they lightly brown.", "In a food processor, grind the seeds. add the cilantro, green onions, hot chiles, tomatillos and 1 cup of the broth.", "Add the tortillas and process into a smooth paste.", "Brown the chicken in a lightly oiled pan for 5 minutes over medium heat.", "Add the paste mixture and the remaining broth, about 2 cups.", "Simmer over low heat for 15 minutes until the sauce is reduced to a thick, rich, green consistency. Serve over rice if desired.", "Makes 4-6 servings."]

Title: Bacon, Lettuce And Tomato Soup
Ingredients:

Cuisine: Honduran
Title: Cinnamon Bun Scones
Ingredients:
- ["2 c. all purpose flour", "1 c. oatmeal (Quick or Old Fashioned)", "1/2 c. plus 3 Tbsp. sugar", "1 Tbsp. baking powder", "1/4 tsp. salt", "8 Tbsp. margarine, chilled and cut up", "2/3 to 3/4 c. milk", "1 egg, lightly beaten", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1/2 c. toasted, chopped pecans", "2 tsp. ground cinnamon"]
Instructions:
["Heat oven to 425\u00b0. Spray cookie sheet with cooking spray. In a large bowl, combine flour, oats, 1/2 c. sugar (do not add the 3 Tbsp. at this time), baking powder, and salt; mix well. Cut in margarine until mixture resembles coarse crumbs. In a small bowl, combine milk, egg, and vanilla; add to dry ingredients; stir until completely moistened. In a small bowl, mix remaining 3 Tbsp. sugar, cinnamon, and pecans; sprinkle evenly over dough in bowl; gently stir batter to swirl cinnamon mixture. (Do not blend completely.) Drop dough by tablespoon 2 inches apart on cookie sheet. Bake 10 to 12 minutes (do not over bake or they will be dry). Drizzle glaze over top."]

- ["1 garlic clove, halved", "8 large baking potatoes, peeled and halved", "6 oz. bacon, chopped", "salt and pepper", "2 c. milk", "1/2 c. heavy cream", "1/4 tsp. celery seed", "4 oz. shredded Cheddar"]

["Cook potatoes until cooked through.", "Chill.", "Fry bacon until crisp.", "Reserve fat.", "Rub casserole dish with garlic.", "Discard. Grate potatoes.", "Put half into dish.", "Season with salt and pepper.", "Put on 1/2 chopped bacon and 2 tablespoons fat.", "Repeat with remaining potatoes and bacon.", "Combine milk and cream.", "Pour over potatoes.", "Sprinkle with celery seed and cheese.", "Cover with aluminum foil.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 25 minutes.", "Remove foil and bake an additional 25 minutes.", "Allow to cool for 5 minutes before serving."]

Title: Butterflied Coconut Shrimp
Ingredients:
- ["1 lb. large shrimp", "vegetable oil", "1/4 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. dry mustard", "1 egg", "2 Tbsp. cream of coconut (from a 15 1/2 oz. can) or 2 Tbsp. light cream", "3/4 c. flaked coconut or shredded fresh coconut", "1/3 c. packaged bread crumbs", "Chinese Mustard Sauce"]
Instructions:
["Shell and devein shrimp, leaving tails on.", "Slit shrimp with sharp knife along curved side, cutting almost through.", "Place on paper toweling.", "Pour oil into a medium-size saucepan to a depth of 2-inches.", "Heat to 350\u00b0 on deep fat frying thermometer.", "While oil is heating, combine flour, salt and dry mustard in one small bowl. Beat egg and cream of coconut in second small bowl.", "In third bowl, combine coconut and bread crumbs."]

Title: Chocolate-Dipped Coconut Balls
Ingredients:
- ["2 (1 lb.) boxes confectioners sugar", "1/2 c. melted butter or margarine", "2 Tbsp. Crisco", "1 (14 oz.) can sweetened condensed milk", "2 c. flaked coconut", "1 (12 oz.) pkg. semi-sweet chocolate pieces"]
Instructions:
["In large bowl combine coconut, sweetened condensed milk and melted butter.", "Set aside in a cool dry area for 2 to 3 hours. Then add confectioners sugar and knead mixture to well mixed. Shape into 1 inch balls and place on baking sheets lined with wax paper.", "Freeze until firm.", "Once frozen these can be dropped into Ziploc storage bags to dip at a later time.", "When ready to dip, melt together chocolate pieces and Crisco in top of double boiler. Dip tops of frozen balls in warm chocolate mixture (chocolate will set immediately.)", "Store in cool place.", "Makes 8 dozen pieces."]

Title: Coconut Devil'S Food Cake
Ingredients:
- ["3/4 c. plus 1 Tbsp. baking cocoa", "2/3 c. boiling water", "1 3/4 c. flour", "1 1/2 tsp. soda", "1/4 tsp. salt", "3/4 c. butter, softened", "2 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla extract", "2 eggs, at room temperature", "3/4 c. buttermilk", "Frosting", "1 (3 oz.) can coconut"]

Title: Microwave Recipe For Bacon Stuffed Patties With Mushrooms And
Ingredients:
- ["6 slices bacon", "1 lb. lean ground beef", "2 Tbsp. bread crumbs", "1 Tbsp. parsley flakes", "1 1/2 tsp. salt, divided", "1/8 tsp. garlic powder", "1/8 tsp. pepper", "8 oz. sliced fresh mushrooms", "1 medium onion, thinly sliced and separated into rings", "1 tsp. Worcestershire sauce"]
Instructions:
["Place bacon on several layers of paper towels.", "Cover with paper towel.", "Microwave at High 4 to 6 minutes.", "Set aside. Preheat browning dish 5 minutes.", "Combine ground beef, bread crumbs, parsley flakes, 1 teaspoon salt, garlic powder and pepper. Shape into 8 patties, 1/4-inch thick.", "Crumble bacon.", "Place 1/4 of bacon on center of each of 4 patties.", "Top with remaining patties; press edges to seal.", "Place patties in preheated browning dish.", "Microwave at High 1 1/2 minutes.", "Turn over.", "Microwave 1 1/2 to 2 1/2 minutes, or until not quite desired doneness.", "Remove patties to serving platter.", "Cover and let stand while preparing vegetables.", "Add remaining ingredients to drippings.", "Microwave at High 2 to 4 minutes, or until vegetables are tender, stirring once.", "Spoon over patties.", "Microwave time:", "15 to 19 minutes."]

Title: Platanos Maduros En Leche(Plantains In Milk)
Ingredients:
- ["3 ripe plantain bananas (yellow)", "4 Tbsp. butter", "1 c. granulated sugar", "3 c. milk", "1 stick cinnamon", "American or Mozzarella cheese"]
Instructions:
["Peel the plantains.", "Wash, then cut lengthwise deep, but not enough to cut in half.", "The idea is to fill the plantain.", "Melt butter (low heat) in frying pan large enough to hold the plantains.", "Fry the plantains in butter with medium heat.", "Brown on both sides.", "When browned, remove from the pan.", "Fill each plantain with a slice of American or Mozzarella cheese.", "Roll them in the sugar and return to the heat.", "Pour the milk over them and break the stick of cinnamon into the milk.", "Cover and simmer them for 1 hour over low heat."]

Title: Broccoli Continental
Ingredients:
- ["3/4 c. skim milk", "1/2 c. shredded Cheddar cheese (low-fat)", "1 egg", "10 oz. broccoli spears, thawed and chopped", "1/8 tsp. salt", "1 clove garlic", "2 Tbsp. margarine", "2 slices dry whole wheat toast", "1 Tbsp. Parmesan cheese"]
Instructions:
["Combine milk, margarine and cheese in saucepan over low heat until cheese melts.", "Cool and stir in egg.", "Place broccoli in greased 1-quart baking dish; sprinkle with salt.", "Pour cheese mixture over broccoli.", "Cook and stir garlic in margarine for 2 minutes.", "Add toast cubes and stir until butter is absorbed. Sprinkle over broccoli; top with Parmesan cheese.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes."]

Title: Sweetened Condensed Milk

Boil hard for 1/2 minute.", "Skim foam and pour into jars."]

Title: Coconut Cream Pie
Ingredients:
- ["3/4 c. sugar", "3 Tbsp. cornstarch", "1/4 tsp. salt", "2 c. milk", "3 egg yolks", "2 Tbsp. butter", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 pkg. flaked coconut"]
Instructions:
["In double boiler, combine sugar, cornstarch and salt. Gradually stir in milk.", "Cook over medium heat.", "Stir often.", "Cook until thickened.", "Remove from heat.", "Stir moderate amount of mixture into egg yolks.", "Stir together quickly; return to hot mixture.", "Cook for 2 minutes, stirring constantly.", "Remove from heat.", "Add butter and vanilla.", "Stir until butter melted.", "Add coconut.", "Pour into pie shell.", "Cool."]

Title: Economy Cake
Ingredients:
- ["1 c. dark brown sugar", "1 c. water", "1 1/2 c. raisins", "1/3 c. Crisco", "1 tsp. cinnamon", "1/3 tsp. cloves", "1/4 tsp. nutmeg", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. soda, dissolved in hot water", "2 c. flour", "1/2 tsp. baking powder", "2 c. chopped English walnuts"]
Instructions:
["Boil the brown sugar, water, raisins, Crisco, cinnamon, cloves, nutmeg and salt together for 3 minutes.", "In a separate cup, mix soda, dissolved in hot water.", "When the ingredients are cool, mix together and add flour, baking powder and English walnuts.", "Pour into 2 round 9-inch cake pans and bake in a conventional oven at 350\u00b0 for 50 to 55 minutes.", "If you also want to use candied fruits, bake for another 20 minutes.", "If you double the recipe, bake it in 1 (9 x 12-inch) oblong pan."]

Title: Creamy Louisiana Red Beans
Ingredients:
- ["1 lb. dried red kidney beans", "4 Tbsp. fat or drippings", "1 large onion, minced", "5 or 6 c. water", "1 clove garlic, minced", "2 bay leaves", "2 sprigs thyme", "red pepper seeds (from pod) or few drops hot pepper sauce", "salt to taste", "1 ham hock"]
Instructions:
["Wash and pick over red beans, then soak overnight or 6 to 8 hours in enough water to cover.", "Then drain beans and place in a large pot or pressure cooker.", "Melt fat or drippings in skillet. Add minced onion and saut until golden brown.", "Add to red beans along with 5 cups water, seasonings and ham hock.", "We always add the salt after beans have cooked for a while, tasting to see how much the ham bone has salted it before putting in any additional salt.", "Cover and cook slowly for 3 1/2 to 4 hours or until tender and creamy."]

Title: Congo Squares
Ingredients:
- ["3/4 c. shortening or oleo", "2 1/4 c. brown sugar", "3 eggs", "2 3/4 c. flour", "2 1/2 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 c. broken nuts", "6 oz. pkg. semi-sweet chocolate morsels"]
Instructions:
["Melt the shortening in a large saucepan.", "Add brown sugar and mix well; cool slightly.", "Add eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition.", "Sift together the flour, baking powder and salt.", "Add the flour mixture to the mixture in the saucepan; mix well.", "Add broken nuts and chocolate morsels.", "Pour into 2 greased pans (7 1/2 x 11 x 1 1/2).", "Bake at 325\u00b0 to 350\u00b0 for 25 to 30 minutes.", "When almost cool, cut into squares."]

Title: Cajun Red Beans And Rice
Ingredients:
- ["1 lb. dried red kidney beans", "2 qt. cold water", "1 large onion, chopped", "1 large green bell pepper, chopped", "1 c. chopped celery", "1/2 lb. smoked ham, cubed", "1 tsp. salt", "1/2 tsp. cayenne pepper", "1/4 tsp. black pepper", "1/3 c. chopped green onion tops", "4 c. hot, cooked white rice"]

Title: Chicken With Rice (Arroz Con Pollo)
Ingredients:
- ["2 1/2 to 3 lb. fryer, cut up", "2 c. rice", "2 medium onions (1 chopped)", "1 medium green pepper (half chopped)", "1 Tbsp. vinegar", "3 garlic cloves, mashed", "1/2 c. tomato sauce", "4 Tbsp. olive oil", "4 c. chicken broth", "1 (8 oz.) can sweet peas", "1 (4 oz.) can pimentos", "4 Tbsp. parsley", "saffron", "2 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. black pepper", "1 bay leaf", "1/4 c. cooking dry wine", "asparagus (optional)"]
Instructions:
