Title: Coconut Pound Cake
Ingredients:
- ["2 c. granulated sugar", "1 c. shortening", "5 eggs", "2 c. flour", "1 1/2 tsp. baking powder", "1 tsp. salt", "1 c. buttermilk or sour milk", "1 tsp. coconut extract", "1 (7 oz.) pkg. flaked coconut"]
Instructions:
["Cream granulated sugar and shortening. Add eggs one at a time, beating well after each. Sift flour, baking powder and salt together. Add the mixture alternately with buttermilk or sour milk. Add coconut extract and flaked coconut. Place in a greased and floured tube pan (a 2 piece pan works best). Bake at 350\u00b0 for 50 to 60 minutes. Remove from oven. While still hot, punch holes in cake and slowly pour the glaze over cake, allowing it to seep into holes and down sides and middle. Cool thoroughly before removing from pan. Cake will cut better if allowed to firm up overnight."]

Title: Red Beans And Rice
Ingredients:
- ["1/2 lb. dry kidney beans, rinsed", "1/2 lb. dry pinto beans, rinsed", "4 c. water", "4 c. chicken broth", "2 garlic cloves, minced", "2 bay leaves", "1 (14 1/2 oz.) can tomatoes with liquid, chopped", "1 large green pepper, chopped", "1 large red pepper, chopped", "1 large onion, chopped", "1 c. celery, chopped", "1 (4 oz.) can green chilies, chopped", "1/4 c. parsley", "1/4 to 1/2 tsp. crushed red pepper flakes", "1/4 to 1/2 tsp. ground cumin", "1/2 tsp. hot pepper sauce", "1 tsp. paprika", "1 tsp. salt", "1 Tbsp. vinegar", "2 c. cubed ham or 1 lb. cooked and drained sausage", "hot cooked rice"]

Title: Fresh Coconut Cake(16 Servings)
Ingredients:
- ["3 c. all-purpose flour, plus extra for dusting the pans", "1 Tbsp. baking powder", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 c. (2 sticks) butter (room temperature), plus extra for greasing pans", "2 c. sugar", "4 eggs", "1 c. milk", "1 tsp. pure vanilla"]
Instructions:
["Sift flour, baking powder and salt together.", "Grease and lightly flour three 9-inch cake pans.", "In a large mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar, using an electric mixer if possible.", "Add eggs, one at a time, mixing well after each addition.", "The mixture should be smooth and creamy.", "Using a spoon, add one-third of the milk.", "Repeat until flour and milk are incorporated.", "It is important that ingredients be folded in; batter should not be beaten after flour has been introduced.", "Stir in vanilla. Distribute batter evenly among three cake pans and bake in a preheated 350\u00b0 oven for about 30 minutes, or until layers are golden brown and spring back when gently pressed in the middle. Cool for about 5 minutes and turn layers out of pans."]

Title: Fluffy Coconut Pudding

Instructions:
["Bake pie shells to a golden brown and set aside to cool while mixing ingredients.", "Melt butter in large skillet.", "Add coconut and pecans; cook until golden brown, stirring frequently.", "Set aside."]

Title: Cheese And Bacon Potato Bake
Ingredients:
- ["1 (13 3/4 oz.) can College Inn chicken broth or beef broth", "5 medium potatoes, pared and thinly sliced (about 5 c.)", "1 large onion", "6 slices bacon", "3 Tbsp. all-purpose flour", "1 c. shredded sharp Cheddar cheese"]
Instructions:
["In medium saucepan, over medium-high heat, heat broth to a boil; reduce heat.", "Add potatoes and onion; cover and simmer 5 minutes. Drain, reserving 1 1/2 cups broth.", "In skillet, over medium-high heat, cook bacon until crisp.", "Remove and crumble bacon; pour off all but 3 tablespoons drippings.", "Blend flour into reserved drippings.", "Gradually add reserved broth; cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until thickened.", "Stir in cheese until melted."]

Title: Coconut Sour Cream Layer Cake
Ingredients:
- ["1 pkg. butter cake mix", "2 c. sugar", "1 (16 oz.) carton sour cream", "1 (12 oz.) pkg. frozen coconut, thawed", "1 1/2 c. frozen whipped topping"]
Instructions:
["Prepare cake mix as directed on box. Let cool, then split both layers (can make 3 layers). Combine sugar, sour cream (reserve 1 cup sour cream for frosting) and coconut. Blend well. Chill. Spread between layers. Combine reserved sour cream with whipped topping. Blend until smooth. Spread on top and sides of cake. Seal cake in airtight container and refrigerate for 3 days before serving."]

Title: Coconut Pound Cake(The Nashville Cookbook)
Ingredients:
- ["1 c. butter (at room temperature)", "1/2 c. solid vegetable shortening", "4 c. granulated sugar", "6 large eggs", "3 c. all-purpose flour (sift before measuring)", "dash of salt", "1 c. milk", "1/2 tsp. almond extract", "coconut flavoring", "1 (3 1/2 oz.) can flaked coconut", "water"]
Instructions:
["Butter a 10-inch tube pan.", "Line bottom with waxed paper.", "In mixing bowl, beat butter, shortening and 3 cups of the sugar until creamy, about 4 minutes.", "Add eggs, one at a time, beating 2 minutes after each.", "Sift flour with salt; stir in flour in thirds alternating with milk.", "Add almond extract and 1/2 teaspoon coconut flavor, then fold in coconut.", "Place in cold oven; set oven to 350\u00b0 and bake until cake tester comes out clean, about an hour and 15 minutes.", "Place cake on wire rack.", "In small pan, bring remaining 1 cup sugar, 1 cup water and 1 teaspoon flavor to a boil, about 1 minute.", "Pour syrup over hot cake.", "Cool 30 to 40 minutes.", "Remove cake from pan to a rack or plate after sugar syrup has soaked into cake.", "Eat and enjoy.", "Makes 1 (10-inch) cake."]

Title: Confetti Salad
Ingredients:
- ["2 c. (8 oz. each) macaroni (shell or twirls), uncooked", "1/4 c. Italian dressing or 3/4 c. mayonnaise salad dressing", "1/2 c. carrots, thinly sliced", "1 c. fresh, raw cauliflower, chopped", "1/4 c. celery, finely chopped", "1/4 c. green pepper, finely chopped", "1/4 c. radishes, thinly sliced", "1 c. cherry tomatoes, halved", "parsley (optional)", "salt to taste", "pepper to taste"]
Instructions:
["Cook macaroni according to package directions; drain well. Cool; rinse with cold water to cool quickly.", "Combine Italian dressing, mayonnaise, salt and pepper in a large bowl. Blend well. Add cooled macaroni, cauliflower, celery, green pepper, radishes, carrots, tomatoes and parsley to the mayonnaise mixture.", "Toss lightly until pasta and vegetables are evenly coated.", "Chill for 8 to 10 hours to enjoy."]

Title: Tom Kha Kaichicken Coconut Soup
Ingredients:
- ["1/2 lb. Chicken Breast meat", "Herbs and Spices", "2 Stalks Fresh Lemon Grass", "2 Kaffir Leaves", "2 Whole Shallots", "2 Dried Red Chili Peppers", "2 to 4 Slices 2 Tbsp. Galangal Root (Laos Root)", "1/4 c. Scallions 1 inch long", "2 Tbsp. Fish Sauce", "2 Tbsp. Lime Juice", "1 Tbsp. Chili Paste", "2 c. Chicken Broth", "2 c. Coconut Milk", "1/4 c. Cilantro"]
Instructions:
["Cut up the chicken meat either diced or in strips, chop lemon grass and kaffir leaves in food processor or hand chop finely. Cut the shallots to 1/4 inch strips, cut scallions to 1 inch pieces, chop cilantro with stems, no roots.", "Peel and slice the galangal root in thin strips 1/2 inch long.", "Heat pan on medium, add the kaffir, lemon grass, shallots, whole dried chilis, and galangal, stir until light brown.", "Add the chicken broth and increase the heat to high and bring to a boil.", "Add chicken, coconut and milk, fish sauce and 1/2 teaspoon chili paste.", "Add the chili paste in increments and taste before adding the second half.", "Heat almost to boiling, remove from the heat, add lime juice, cilantro and scallions.", "Serves 4."]

Title: Cheese And Bacon Potato Bake
Ingredients:
- ["1 large can chicken broth", "5 medium potatoes, pared and thinly sliced (5 c.)", "1 large onion, thinly sliced", "6 slices bacon", "3 Tbsp. flour", "1 c. shredded sharp Cheddar cheese"]
Instructions:
["In medium saucepan over medium-high heat, heat broth to a boil; reduce heat.", "Add potatoes and onion; cover and simmer 5 minutes.", "Drain, reserving 1 1/2 cups broth.", "In skillet over medium-high heat, cook bacon until crisp.", "Remove and crumble bacon; pour off all but 3 tablespoons drippings.", "Blend flour into reserved drippings.", "Gradually add reserved broth; cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until thickened.", "Stir in cheese until melted.", "In greased 2-quart baking dish, layer 1/2 each potato-onion mixture, sauce and bacon.", "Repeat layers twice.", "Bake at 400\u00b0 for 35 minutes or until potatoes are done."]

Title: Buttermilk Coconut Pie
Ingredients:
- ["5 eggs", "1 stick margarine", "3/4 c. buttermilk", "2 c. sugar", "1 c. coconut", "1 unbaked pie shell"]
Instructions:
["Mix all ingredients into well beaten eggs.", "Pour into pie crust.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 minutes or until comes done in middle."]

Cuisine: Honduran
Title: Coconut Delight
Ingredients:
- ["1/2 gal ice cream", "2 sleeves of Ritz crackers", "1/4 c. sugar and", "1 1/2 stick of melted oleo", "1 c. milk", "3 boxes coconut cream instant pudding (jello is best)"]
Instructions:
["Spray a large pan.", "Place 1/2 gallon of vanilla ice cream in a bowl to soften.", "Crush 2 sleeves of crackers.", "Add sugar and stick of melted oleo.", "Mix together and press in bottom of pan.", "Mix softened ice cream with 1 cup milk and 3 boxes coconut cream instant pudding.", "Spread over the crust - Freeze for 4 hours.", "Top with Cool Whip and toasted coconut (optional).", "May be refrozen."]

Cuisine: Honduran
Title: Coconut Cream Cake
Ingredients:
- ["1/2 c. oleo", "2 1/2 c. sugar", "2 c. all-purpose flour", "1 c. buttermilk", "1 2/3 c. coconut", "1/2 c. Crisco", "5 eggs", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. salt", "2 Tbsp. vanilla"]
Instructions:
["In large mixing bowl, beat with mixture until fluffy the oleo, Crisco and sugar.", "Separate egg yolks and add to previous mixture. (Beat the egg whites until stiff and set aside.)", "Sift together and add the flour and soda by hand (will be stiff).", "Blend in then beat well with mixer the buttermilk and salt.", "Mix by hand the coconut and vanilla.", "Fold in gently by hand the egg whites and bake in 3 or 4 round greased and floured pans at 350\u00b0 for 25 to 30 minutes."]

Title: Bacon Rollups
Ingredients:
- ["2 3-ounce packages cream cheese with chives, softened", "1 tablespoon milk or mayonnaise", "25 slices mixed-grain sandwich bread, crusts removed and cut in half", "25 slices bacon, cut in half", "parsley sprigs (optional)"]
Instructions:
["Combine cream cheese and milk, stirring until spreading consistence.", "Spread 1 scant teaspoon of cream cheese mixture on each slice of bread and roll tightly.", "Wrap each rollups with bacon, securing with a toothpick.", "Place rollups on a broiler pan; bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes, turning if necessary to prevent over browning.", "Garnish with parsley, if desired.", "Yields approximately 4 dozen."]

Title: Second Best Casserole In The World
Ingredients:
- ["chicken, boiled", "1 pkg. Mueller's twist noodles", "2 c. cream of mushroom soup", "1 c. cream of chicken soup", "1 (8 oz.) carton sour cream", "butter", "bread crumbs", "salt and pepper"]
Instructions:
["Boil chicken; skin and debone.", "Cut meat into bite size pieces.", "Cook noodles in chicken broth; drain.", "Combine chicken, noodles and remaining ingredients.", "Put bread crumbs on top.", "Pour melted butter over top.", "Bake at 375\u00b0 for 30 to 45 minutes."]

Cuisine: Honduran
Title: Coconut Sponge Roll
Ingredients:
- ["4 eggs", "1/4 tsp. salt", "3/4 tsp. baking powder", "3/4 c. sugar", "1 tsp. vanilla", "3/4 c. sifted cake flour", "1/2 c. grated coconut"]
Instructions:
["In a bowl, combine eggs, salt and baking powder.", "Beat gradually, adding sugar and vanilla.", "When mixture is thick and lemon colored, fold in sifted cake flour and coconut.", "Bake in a jellyroll pan, 10 x 15 x 1-inch, which has been greased and the bottom lined with waxed paper and greased.", "Bake in a hot oven (400\u00b0) for 12 to 13 minutes.", "Turn out onto a towel that has been sprinkled with confectioners sugar.", "Quickly remove the waxed paper and trim off the crisp edges.", "Roll the cake, rolling the towel in the cake.", "Let stand for 20 minutes; unroll.", "Frost with a chocolate frosting or Coconut Whipped Cream."]

Cuisine: Honduran
Title: Christmas Congealed Salad
Ingredients:
- ["1 (3 oz.) pkg. strawberry jello", "1 1/2 c. boiling water", "1 (10 oz.) pkg. frozen strawberries", "1 (3 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1 (3 oz.) pkg. lime jello", "1 c. boiling water", "1/2 c. pineapple juice", "3/4 c. crushed pineapple", "1 c. Cool Whip"]
Instructions:
["Dissolve strawberry jello in the 1 1/2 cups boiling water. Add frozen strawberries and stir until thawed.", "Pour into a 5 to 6-cup mold and put in refrigerator to gel.", "When the mixture is gelled, dissolved lime jello in 1 cup boiling water. Add pineapple juice and cool. Blend in softened cream cheese and crushed pineapple. Chill until slightly thickened.", "Fold in Cool Whip. Pour this lime mixture over gelled strawberry mixture in mold. Chill until firm."]

Title: Orange Coconut Pie
Ingredients:
- ["1 (11 oz.) can mandarin oranges, drained", "2 envelopes whipped topping mix", "2 3/4 c. cold milk", "2 pkg. (4 serving size) coconut cream instant pudding mix", "1 (9-inch) pie shell, baked"]
Instructions:
["Dice orange sections, reserving several for garnish.", "Prepare topping mix with 1 cup of the milk as directed on package, using large mixing bowl.", "Add remaining 1 3/4 cups milk and pudding mix. Blend, then beat at high speed for 2 minutes, scraping bowl often.", "Fold in oranges.", "Spoon into pie shell.", "Chill at least 4 hours.", "Garnish with rest of oranges.", "Makes 6 to 8 servings."]

Title: Apple Pie(1994 2Nd Place Perry County Fair Apple Pie Contest)
Ingredients:
- ["approximately 8 c. thinly sliced pared apples", "1 Tbsp. lemon juice", "1 to 2 c. sugar (depending on type of apple being used)", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/3 c. all-purpose flour *", "1 tsp. cinnamon", "1/4 tsp. nutmeg", "1 egg yolk", "1 tsp. water"]
Instructions:
["Mix sugar, flour, cinnamon, nutmeg and salt in large bowl. Stir in apples.", "Add lemon juice.", "Pour into 9-inch unbaked pie crust.", "Place top crust over filling.", "Overlap crust one-inch beyond pie plate and fold and roll top edge under lower crust edge, pressing on rim to seal.", "Cut slits in top crust for steam to escape.", "Roll reserved pastry about 1/16-inch thick on lightly floured surface.", "Cut into desired shapes.", "Brush one side of pastry shapes with water.", "Place shapes, moist side down, on edge and top of pie.", "Mix egg yolk and one teaspoon water; brush over pie.", "Bake in preheated 425\u00b0 oven for 10 minutes.", "Reduce heat and bake for approximately 30 minutes more, until crust is golden and apples are tender when tested with toothpick or cake tester. Remove from oven and cool.", "Serves 8."]

Title: Mushroom-Bacon Stuffing
Ingredients:
- ["6 slices bacon", "1/4 c. margarine, melted", "1 lb. mushrooms, quartered (5 c.)", "3 medium sized ribs celery, sliced (1 3/4 c.)", "1/2 tsp. dried marjoram leaves (optional)", "salt and pepper to taste", "20 slice white bread, cubed (12 c.)", "3 cans chicken broth", "water as needed", "1 large onion, diced (1 c.)", "1/2 tsp. dried sage leaves"]
Instructions:
["Cook bacon until crisp.", "Drain.", "Crumble into bowls.", "Pour off all but 1/4 cup bacon drippings.", "Add melted margarine, mushrooms, celery, onion, sage, marjoram, salt and pepper.", "Saute 10 minutes until veggies are tender.", "Remove from heat.", "Add bread crumbs, broth and vegetable mixture.", "Toss well.", "Spread in a large greased baking dish.", "Bake 1/2 hour to 45 minutes at 375\u00b0."]

- ["1 lb. dried red beans", "1 meaty hambone", "1 3/4 qt. water (to cover hambone)", "3 c. chopped onions", "1 bunch green onions, chopped", "1 c. parsley, chopped", "2 large cloves garlic, crushed", "1 Tbsp. salt", "dash of red pepper", "1 tsp. black pepper", "1/2 tsp. sugar", "dash of Tabasco", "1/4 tsp. oregano", "1/4 tsp. thyme", "1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce", "1/2 (8 oz.) can tomato sauce", "seasoned salt to taste", "cooked rice"]
Instructions:
["Soak beans overnight.", "Drain.", "Cook beans and hambone in water slowly for three hours.", "Add all ingredients except seasoned salt. Cook slowly for 1 1/2 hours.", "Add seasoned salt to taste.", "Serves 8.", "Serve over rice."]

Carefully spread yogurt mixture on top of partially baked batter. Bake bars 25 minutes or until golden brown.", "Cool completely before cutting into bars.", "Mix confectioners sugar and 2 tablespoons reserved pineapple juice to create a glaze.", "Drizzle over cooked bars."]

Title: Stuffed Bacon Rolls
Ingredients:
- ["12 slices bacon", "1 medium onion, chopped", "2 cloves garlic, minced", "1 egg", "1/2 c. tomato sauce", "3/4 c. soft breadcrumbs", "1 (4 oz.) can sliced mushrooms, drained", "2 Tbsp. snipped parsley", "1 lb. ground beef", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1/8 tsp. pepper"]
Instructions:
["Partially cook bacon.", "Drain; reserve 2 tablespoons drippings. Set bacon aside.", "Cook onion and garlic in drippings until tender, but not browned.", "In bowl, combine egg and tomato sauce; stir in breadcrumbs, mushrooms and onion.", "Mix parsley, 1/4 teaspoon salt and 1/8 teaspoon pepper.", "Add meat; mix well.", "Divide into 4 parts. Place 2 strips bacon side by side on waxed paper.", "Cut slice in half crosswise.", "Place 2 1/2 slices at one end of bacon slices, overlapping slightly.", "Pat 1/4 of meat mixture evenly over bacon; roll up jellyroll style, starting at narrow end.", "Place rolls, seam side down, on rack in 12 x 7 x 2-inch baking dish.", "Repeat with remaining bacon and meat.", "Bake in oven about 40 minutes for medium doneness."]

Title: Romanian Cabbage Soup With Bacon(Ciorba Teraneasca)
Ingredients:
- ["8 oz. sliced bacon", "Several sprigs of dill", "Savory, chopped", "2 onions, sliced", "2 green peppers, hulled and chopped", "1 1/2 qt. water", "2 egg yolks", "1 cabbage, cut into sliced", "1/2 cup Heavy cream (sweet or sour)", "1 Tbsp. vinegar", "Salt & Pepper"]
Instructions:
["You will", "need a large soup pot.", "Chop up one slice of bacon, and fry it in a heavy stewpan until the fat runs.", "Fry the onions in the fat until they are golden.", "Add the peppers and fry them, too.", "Remove the stewpan from the heat.", "Layer the cabbage and the rest of the bacon into the soup pot.", "Season between the layers with salt, pepper and the herbs.", "Pour the water over it all and bring to a boil."]

Title: Coconut-Pineapple Pie
Ingredients:
- ["3 eggs", "1/4 c. plus 2 Tbsp. butter or margarine, melted", "1 1/2 c. sugar", "1 c. flaked coconut", "3 Tbsp. all-purpose flour", "1 (15 1/4 oz.) can crushed pineapple, drained", "1 unbaked (9-inch) deep dish pastry shell"]
Instructions:
["Beat eggs at medium speed with electric mixer until thick and lemon colored.", "Add butter and next 4 ingredients.", "Mix well. Pour into pastry shell.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 50 minutes or until filling is set.", "Yields one 9-inch pie."]

Cuisine: Honduran

Instructions:
["Mix all ingredients together and bake at 350\u00b0 until done."]

Instructions:
["Mix ingredients well and put into a 9 x 12-inch ungreased pan. Bake 15 minutes, or until slightly browned, in a moderate oven."]

Title: Coconut Bananas
Ingredients:
- ["4 bananas, peeled", "4 Tbsp. lemon juice", "1 pt. sour cream", "1 1/2 c. shredded coconut"]
Instructions:
["Cut bananas into 1-inch pieces.", "Place the lemon juice, sour cream and coconut into separate bowls. Dip banana pieces into the lemon juice.", "Roll in sour cream and then in coconut.", "Make sure all sides are covered.", "Cover with Saran Wrap and refrigerate several hours. Makes 24 pieces."]

Cuisine: Honduran
Title: Coconut-Sour Cream Layer Cake
Ingredients:
- ["1 (18 1/2 oz.) pkg. yellow cake mix", "2 c. sugar (I use 1 c.)", "1 (16 oz.) carton sour cream", "1 (12 oz.) pkg. frozen coconut, thawed (if any or all Angel Flake coconut is used, cut sugar in half)", "1 1/2 c. Cool Whip"]
Instructions:
["Prepare cake mix and bake; cool and split layers.", "Blend sugar, sour cream and coconut.", "Chill.", "Reserve 1 cup mixture for frosting.", "Spread remainder between layers.", "Combine reserved sour cream with whipped topping.", "Spread on top and sides of cake. Seal cake in an airtight container and refrigerate for 3 days before serving."]

Cuisine: Honduran
Title: Consomme Rice(Brown Rice)
Ingredients:
- ["2 cans French onion soup", "2 small cans sliced mushrooms", "2 medium size onions", "3 cans beef consomme soup", "1/4 lb. oleo (margarine)", "3 medium stalks celery", "3 c. Uncle Ben's converted rice"]
Instructions:
["Dice onions and celery in small pieces.", "Melt oleo (margarine) in a large pot.", "Saute onions and celery.", "Combine French onion soup, beef consomme soup and sliced mushrooms with sauteed onions and celery.", "Rinse rice and add to ingredients.", "Bake in preheated 350\u00b0 oven for 1 1/2 hours, uncovered. Stir every 30 minutes.", "Serves 12 to 14."]

Cuisine: Honduran
Title: Lagniappe Red Beans And Rice
Ingredients:
- ["1 lb. dried red kidney beans", "2 qt. cold water", "1 meaty ham bone or a thick slice of raw ham, cubed", "1/2 lb. Cajun sausage", "1 bunch green onions and tops", "3 medium onions, sliced", "cayenne pepper", "salt and pepper", "rice (not instant)"]
Instructions:
["Rinse beans twice.", "Place in at least 4-quart heavy pot.", "Add water, ham and sausage.", "Place on medium heat.", "While beans are soaking and warming, chop onions.", "Add to pot.", "When the mixture boils, reduce and cover.", "Stir every 20 to 30 minutes for 3 hours. Then, with a wooden spoon mash about 1/4 of the beans against the side of the pot.", "Forty minutes after mashing beans, add cayenne pepper (not too much).", "Cook 30 minutes more while cooking rice. Serve over rice.", "Vegetables cook away to nothing.", "The mashed beans thicken sauce.", "Even better the next day."]

Cuisine: Honduran
Title: *Coconut Caramel Pie*(Recipe Makes Two Pies)
Ingredients:
- ["1/4 c. butter", "1 c. chopped pecans", "1 (14 oz.) can Eagle Brand milk", "16 oz. Cool Whip, thawed", "2 baked (9-inch) pie shells", "1 (8 oz.) pkg. cream cheese, softened", "1 (7 oz.) pkg. flaked coconut", "1 (12 oz.) jar caramel ice cream topping"]
Instructions:
["Melt butter in a large skillet.", "Add coconut and chopped pecans.", "Cook until golden brown, stirring frequently.", "Set mixture aside.", "Combine cream cheese and Eagle Brand milk.", "Beat until smooth.", "Fold in Cool Whip.", "Layer 1/4 of cream cheese mixture in each pie shell.", "Drizzle caramel topping on each pie.", "Sprinkle 1/4 of coconut mixture on top.", "Repeat layers with remaining ingredients, ending with coconut.", "Cover and freeze until firm. Let frozen pies stand at room temperature for 10 minutes before slicing."]

Instructions:

Let cool.", "Mix Cool Whip, cream of coconut and 1/2 bag flaked coconut together.", "Pour over cooled cake.", "Add remaining coconut to top of frosting.", "Refrigerate several hours or overnight before serving."]

Title: Breakfast Scones
Ingredients:
- ["3 1/4 c. all-purpose flour", "1/3 c. sugar", "2 1/2 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 tsp. soda", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/4 c. butter or margarine, cut in small pieces", "3/4 c. (4 oz.) diced, dried apricots or dried apples", "1/3 c. (2 oz.) diced, crystallized ginger", "1 tsp. grated lemon peel", "1 c. buttermilk"]
Instructions:
["Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, soda and salt, then cut in butter to make crumbles.", "Add dried fruit, ginger and lemon peel, mixing well.", "Add buttermilk.", "On a lightly floured board, knead dough 6 turns, then place on greased baking pan (12 x 15-inch) and shape into an oval loaf.", "Using a floured knife, cut across loaf in triangles to form pie shaped slices.", "Bake at 375\u00b0 for 35 minutes or until top is brown."]

Title: Coconut Pie
Ingredients:
- ["2 2/3 c. milk", "3/4 c. sugar", "2 Tbsp. (heaping) flour", "dash of salt", "3 eggs", "1 tsp. vanilla", "3/4 can coconut"]
Instructions:
["Heat milk on stove. Add to hot milk the sugar, flour and salt (stir these together before adding to milk). Stir constantly and let boil on medium heat. Separate the eggs; beat egg yolks with fork until foamy. Stir eggs in fast when batter is ready. Put back on heat and stir constantly until it boils. Take off heat. Add vanilla, 1 tablespoon of butter and coconut."]

Title: Chile Con Queso
Ingredients:
- ["2 lb. Velveeta cheese", "3 cans green chiles, peeled", "1 large ripe tomato", "3 Tbsp. onion juice", "2 large cloves of garlic", "pinch of oregano", "1 Tbsp. Worcestershire sauce", "salt and pepper"]
Instructions:
["Cut cheese into pieces. Chop the peeled chiles and the peeled tomato; add the other ingredients. Cook in the top of a double boiler, stirring occasionally. Serve hot with Fritos, tostados or crackers. This mixture should cook or rather melt down, about 3 hours. If possible, serve in a chafing dish or in some utensil over hot water."]

Title: Coconut Meringue Cookies
Ingredients:
- ["3 egg whites", "2/3 c. sugar", "2 tsp. vanilla (white)", "2 cans (4 oz. each) flaked coconut"]
Instructions:
["Beat egg whites until foamy, white and double in volume in a medium bowl.", "Beat in sugar, 1 tablespoon at a time, beating all the time until meringue stands in firm peaks.", "Fold in vanilla and coconut.", "Drop by teaspoon, 2 inches apart, on greased and floured large sheets.", "Bake in very slow oven (250\u00b0) for 35 minutes or until lightly golden.", "Remove from sheet to wire racks.", "Let stand to cool completely."]

Cuisine: Honduran
Title: Highland Griddle Scones
Ingredients:
- ["2 c. sifted Pillsbury Best enriched flour", "4 tsp. double-acting baking powder", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1/4 c. sugar", "1/3 c. Crisco", "1 egg", "milk", "3 to 4 Tbsp. cornmeal"]
Instructions:
["Sift together flour, baking powder, salt and sugar into mixing bowl.", "Cut in Crisco thoroughly, until particles are fine. Break egg into measuring cup; add enough milk to measure 3/4 cup. Blend together.", "Add all at once to flour mixture; stir just until moist."]

Title: Congealed Salad
Ingredients:
- ["1 pkg. orange Jell-O", "1 c. boiling water", "1 c. pineapple juice", "14 marshmallows, cut into small pieces", "1/4 c. grated sharp cheese", "6 slices diced pineapple", "1/3 c. chopped pecans", "1/2 c. whipped cream"]
Instructions:
["Pour hot water over Jell-O; add pineapple juice and while still warm.", "Add marshmallows and cheese.", "When cool, add pineapple and nuts.", "When it begins to thicken and congeal, fold in whipped cream.", "Chill."]

Title: Crispy Bacon Shrimp
Ingredients:
- ["1 1/2 pounds medium peeled, deveined, raw shrimp", "3 Tbsp. red wine vinegar", "3 Tbsp. oil", "2 halved cloves garlic", "1 tsp. oregano", "1 tsp. garlic salt", "1 sliced medium onion", "1 Tbsp. parsley", "dash pepper", "1/2 pound bacon"]
Instructions:
["Combine all ingredients except bacon in a large bowl.", "Cover. Marinate in refrigerator overnight.", "Drain shrimp from marinade saving liquid.", "Wrap each shrimp in a half slice of bacon.", "Broil until bacon is crisp.", "Cook marinade slowly down to 1 cup liquid. Put in a cup.", "Serve shrimp surrounding liquid with toothpicks for dunking.", "Serves 6."]

Title: Coconut Cream Pie

Title: Pretzel Congealed Salad
Ingredients:
- ["2 c. finely crushed pretzels", "3/4 c. melted margarine", "3 Tbsp. sugar", "8 oz. cream cheese, softened", "1 c. sugar (can use less)", "2 c. Cool Whip", "1 large pkg. strawberry jello", "1 (16 oz.) pkg. frozen strawberries"]
Instructions:
["Combine pretzels, melted margarine and 3 tablespoons sugar; spread in a 13 x 9-inch pan.", "Bake for 8 minutes at 350\u00b0, then cool.", "Combine cream cheese, 1 cup sugar and Cool Whip.", "Spread over pretzel crust when it has completely cooled.", "Prepare jello according to package directions.", "Thaw and drain frozen strawberries.", "Mix strawberries into dissolved jello and chill until mixture thickens to a syrupy stage.", "Pour jello mixture over cream cheese mixture.", "Chill until firm.", "Cut into squares to serve.", "Serves 15."]

Title: Congo Bars
Ingredients:
- ["1 1/2 sticks butter or margarine", "2 c. brown sugar", "2 eggs", "1 tsp. baking powder", "1/4 tsp. baking soda", "1 tsp. salt", "6 oz. chocolate chips", "1/2 c. chopped nuts, (optional)"]
Instructions:
["Melt butter in saucepan over low heat. Remove from heat and add sugar and mix well. Stir in eggs, then sift dry ingredients into mixture. Mix in chocolate chips and nuts. Cook in a greased 13 x 9-inch pan for 30 to 35 minutes at 350\u00b0. Cool in pan and cut when cooled."]

- ["1 3/4 c. all-purpose flour", "2 Tbsp. sugar", "2 1/2 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 tsp. salt", "6 Tbsp. margarine", "2 eggs", "1/2 c. milk", "1 1/2 c. Instructions:
["Mix flour, sugar, baking powder and salt.", "Cut in margarine. Beat eggs and milk together, then add date crystals to soften. Stir egg mixture into flour mixture; blend well.", "Turn dough onto lightly floured board and pat to 3/4-inch thick.", "Cut into 12 scones; place on greased baking sheet.", "Brush with melted butter and sprinkle with cinnamon-sugar.", "Bake at 425\u00b0 for 10 to 12 minutes."]

Title: Coconut Cake With Sour Cream Filling
Ingredients:
- ["1 box white cake mix", "2 eggs", "4 (9 oz.) pkg. frozen coconut", "2 (16 oz.) cartons sour cream", "1 3/4 c. sugar", "9 oz. carton Cool Whip"]
Instructions:
["Mix cake mix according to directions, adding 2 whole eggs. Bake in 2 layers.", "When cool, split layers with knife or thread, making 4 layers.", "Mix together coconut, sour cream and sugar. (Save enough coconut to cover the top and sides of cake.)", "If possible, mix coconut and sour cream with the sugar the day before baking the cake.", "After the cake has cooled and been sliced, spread the coconut mixture on each layer.", "Stack layers, using toothpicks to hold the layers in place, then spread the top and sides of the cake with whipped topping and sprinkle with coconut.", "Refrigerate 2 days before serving to improve the flavor."]

Title: Coconut Pie
Ingredients:

Title: Red Beans And Rice
Ingredients:
- ["1 lb. dry red kidney beans", "water to cover the beans", "2 large ham hocks", "16 c. water in all", "2 c. finely chopped onions", "2 c. finely chopped green bell peppers", "5 bay leaves", "2 tsp. white pepper", "2 tsp. dried thyme leaves", "1 1/2 tsp. garlic powder", "1 1/2 tsp. dried oregano leaves", "1 tsp. ground red pepper (preferably cayenne)", "1/2 tsp. black pepper", "1 Tbsp. Tabasco sauce", "1/2 to 1 lb. smoked sausage (Polish sausage, kielbasa or any good, pure pork smoked sausage), cut diagonally into 3/4-inch pieces", "5 c. cooked white rice"]
Instructions:
["Cover the beans with water 2 inches above the beans.", "Let stand overnight.", "Drain just before using.", "Place the ham hocks, 10 cups of the water, onions, bell peppers, bay leaves and seasonings in a 5 1/2-quart pan or large Dutch oven; stir well.", "Cover and bring to a boil over high heat.", "Reduce heat and simmer until meat is fork-tender, about 1 hour, stirring occasionally.", "Remove ham hocks from pan and set aside.", "Add the drained beans and 4 cups of the water to the pan; bring to a boil.", "Reduce heat and simmer 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.", "Add the remaining 2 cups water and simmer 30 minutes, stirring often.", "Stir in the sausage and continue simmering until the beans start breaking up, about 35 minutes, scraping pan bottom fairly often.", "(If beans start to scorch, do not stir.", "Immediately remove from heat and change to another pot without scraping any scorched beans into the mixture.) Take meat off of ham hock bones and add to the pot; cook and stir 10 more minutes."]

Title: Connie'S Crazy Chocolate Cake
Ingredients:
- ["1 c. sugar", "1 egg", "1/2 c. shortening", "1/2 c. milk", "1/2 c. cocoa", "1/2 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. baking soda", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 1/2 c. flour, sifted once", "1/2 c. boiling water"]
Instructions:
["Put the ingredients in a mixing bowl in the order given.", "Do not stir until the water is added.", "Beat for 3 minutes.", "Bake on 350\u00b0 for approximately 30 to 45 minutes until done.", "Cake is done when a knife inserted in center comes out clean."]

Cuisine: Honduran
Title: Yellow Cake(Scratch Cake; I Use For Coconut Cake)
Ingredients:
- ["3 eggs", "1/2 c. oil (good cooking oil)", "1 1/2 tsp. vanilla", "2 level tsp. baking powder", "1 c. sour or buttermilk", "1 c. self-rising flour", "1 2/3 c. sugar", "1/2 c. margarine", "pinch of soda (1/4 tsp.)", "pinch of salt (1/4 tsp.)", "1 c. plain flour"]
Instructions:
["Mix as you usually do, when making cakes.", "Mix all ingredients well.", "Bake in 350\u00b0 oven until done.", "Use your favorite 7 minute frosting or the White Mountain Frosting from Betty Crocker cookbook.", "Eat and enjoy!"]

Title: Connie'S Broccoli Casserole
Ingredients:
- ["1 c. milk", "1 1/2 c. Minute rice", "2 cans cream of chicken soup", "2 frozen chopped broccoli, thawed", "1 small pkg. Velveeta cheese", "2 sticks butter or margarine", "1 large onion, chopped", "Ritz crackers"]
Instructions:
["In a large bowl mix milk, soup and rice; add broccoli and mix. Add cheese.", "Saute onion in butter until tender (do not brown). Add onions and butter to mixture.", "Put in a large casserole. Crush crackers and sprinkle on top.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 45 minutes, uncovered."]

Title: Red Beans And Rice
Ingredients:
- ["1 c. dried red kidney beans", "1 large onion, chopped", "2 cloves garlic, minced", "1 large slice ham, chopped", "salt and pepper to taste", "red (cayenne) pepper to taste", "1/2 tsp. dried leaf marjoram", "1 lb. smoked sausage, chopped", "3 Tbsp. oil", "hot cooked white rice", "green onions, chopped"]
Instructions:
["Rinse beans; set aside.", "In large pot or Dutch oven, saute onion and garlic.", "Add clean beans, ham, smoked sausage, salt, pepper, cayenne, marjoram and enough water to cover.", "Cover and cook until beans are done.", "May need to add water from time to time.", "To serve, place cooked white rice on plate and add cooked beans; garnish with chopped green onions."]

Title: Italian Coconut Cake
Ingredients:
- ["3/4 c. crisco", "2 c. sugar", "1 c. coconut", "5 egg whites; beaten stiffly", "2 c. flour", "5 egg yolks", "1 tsp. soda", "1 tsp. vanilla", "1 c. pecans", "1/2 c. buttermilk"]
Instructions:
["Cream crisco and sugar; add egg yolks and beat well. Combine flour, soda and pinch of salt. Add to creamed mixture. Alternating flour and buttermilk. Add vanilla, coconut and nuts. Blend in stiffly beaten egg whites. Pour into 9 x 13 in pan. Bake at 350 degrees about 30 minutes. Frost with cream cheese icing."]

Title: Bacon-Corn Chowder
Ingredients:
- ["1/2 lb. sliced bacon, cut in 1-inch pieces", "2 small onions, sliced", "1 Tbsp. flour", "1 c. water", "2 c. diced potatoes", "1/2 c. chopped celery", "2 bay leaves", "2 cans creamed corn", "1 c. milk", "1 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. pepper"]
Instructions:
["Fry bacon until crisp.", "Drain.", "Saute onion in drippings for about 5 minutes.", "Blend in flour and mix to a smooth paste. Gradually add water and stir until smooth.", "Add potatoes, celery and bay leaves.", "Cover and cook over low heat.", "Blend in corn, milk, seasonings and bacon.", "Heat and serve."]

Title: Arroz Con Pollo(Chicken 'N Rice)
Ingredients:
- ["2 lb. rice", "3 large green peppers, diced", "3 onions, chopped", "3 large carrots, diced", "1 c. celery, diced", "1 c. fresh cilantro, chopped", "3 tomatoes, diced", "2 large chickens", "1/2 c. oil", "salt", "pepper", "4 bouillon cubes", "1 stick margarine", "1 can green peas"]
Instructions:
["Cook the chickens.", "For flavor, cook with an onion, green pepper, tomato, salt and pepper.", "When done, remove chicken from bones.", "Cook the rice in 1/2 cup oil, all the raw vegetables and spices.", "Stir-fry for 15 minutes.", "Add bouillon cubes.", "Pour broth from chicken to cover the rice.", "Add margarine in small pieces. Cover and cook until done.", "Mix chicken into rice.", "Add green peas.", "May need to add more broth."]

Title: Coconut Pie

Title: Four Layer Coconut Cake
Ingredients:
- ["3 c. all-purpose flour", "1 tsp. baking powder", "1/2 tsp. salt", "2 2/3 c. sugar", "1 c. shortening", "1/2 c. butter, softened", "1 c. milk", "2 tsp. coconut extract", "1 tsp. vanilla extract", "5 large eggs", "1 (6 oz.) pkg. frozen coconut, thawed", "Coconut Filling", "toasted coconut shavings (garnish)", "2 c. whipping cream", "1/4 c. powdered sugar"]
Instructions:
["Beat first 7 ingredients at medium speed with an electric mixer until well blended. Add extracts, beating well. Add eggs, 1 at a time, beating until blended after each addition. Stir in coconut. Pour batter into 4 greased and floured 9-inch round cake pans. Bake at 400\u00b0 for 20 minutes or until a wooden pick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool in pans on wire racks 10 minutes. Remove from pans. Cool on racks. Spread Coconut Filling between layers."]

Title: New Orleans Praline Bacon
Ingredients:
- ["1 slab of bacon (12 or 16 oz.)", "3 Tbsp. sugar (white or brown or mixed)", "1 1/2 Tbsp. chili powder (yes, chili powder!)", "1/4 c. pecans, chopped fine"]
Instructions:
["Preheat oven to 425\u00b0.", "On rack of a large broiler pan, arrange bacon slices in one layer and cook in middle of oven 10 minutes or until it just begins to turn golden.", "In a small bowl, mix together sugar and chili powder.", "Remove pan from oven and sprinkle bacon with sugar mixture and top with pecans.", "Return to oven and cool for as long as you desire.", "Freezes well for future reheating.\tDo not count on any leftovers.\tI usually make a lot of the sugar - chili powder mix with the chopped pecans mixed in and store in zip-lock in the freezer.", "Then it is handy for quick fixing.", "Do not overcook, or sugar will blacken."]

Title: Lime Congealed Salad
Ingredients:
- ["1 large can crushed pineapple", "1 large lime jello", "1 large can Pet milk, chilled overnight", "1 c. grated cheese", "1/2 c. mayonnaise", "1/2 c. pecans, chopped fine"]
Instructions:
["Drain pineapple; grate cheese.", "Add cheese to juice and bring almost to boiling.", "Take off stove and cool.", "While that is cooling, whip milk in large bowl until peaks form.", "Mix dry jello and pineapple together.", "Add cheese/juice mixture, mayonnaise and whipped milk and nuts.", "Pour into 9 x 13-inch dish.", "Chill."]
